The Muay Thai show will be available to families with children of all ages. The sport is highly respectful, and there will be no use of vulgar language or reckless behavior. Furthermore, the chanting crowd and high energy will create a wonderfully lively atmosphere that is rarely generated by other forms of boxing. You will enjoy the experience with ring-side seats, giving you an uninterrupted view of all the action.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Sea, Shops, and Michelin Stars
dayInfo.description: Exploring Thailand’s land-dwelling wildlife is a truly humbling experience, however, the country is also teeming with spectacular sea life. On the 6th day of your trip, you will visit Bangkok’s underwater wonderland. The massive aquarium will dazzle and inspire you and your young ones. It boasts exhibits that feature innovative displays of the sea life and contains a jaw-dropping 30,000 creatures. After discovering what is under the sea, you will enjoy the opportunity to delve into Bangkok’s fashion-forward, retail experience at one of Southeast Asia’s premier malls. Here, you will find almost all of the world’s leading fashion institutions under a single roof. It will be the ideal place to spend on spoils for you and your family. After exploring the sea and spoiling your family, you will experience a traditional Thai tuk-tuk for your next transfer. Tuk-tuks have become popular around the globe, with versions popping up in several countries. However, there is nothing quite like a tuk-tuk from Bangkok. You will enjoy the breeze in your hair and city sounds around you as you and your family opt for this unique mode of transport. The colorful and vibrant vehicles will zip around the city in abundance, transferring travelers of all kinds to landmark destinations around the city. You will transfer via your tuk-tuk to a Michelin Star establishment to enjoy the most divine haute cuisine in the city.

dayInfo.title: Kanchanaburi – Floating on the River
dayInfo.description: After exploring more of Bangkok’s best highlights as a family, a trip to Kanchanaburi will offer you a final chance to take in the dazzling Thai environment. Your private transfer will take you to the train station where you will hop on board your first-class cabin and journey to Kanchanaburi. Traveling by train is one of the most exciting ways to see Bangkok, especially on the way to Kanchanaburi. You can take in the views of seemingly endless fields that lead to mountain ranges in the distance. As you pass by, you can also cattle peacefully graze at the grass. The journey will take you out of the booming city energy and transport you into a mindset of complete tranquility and serenity. After experiencing the Bridge over the River Kwai, you will transfer via tugboat to a luxurious floating raft hotel. Situated along the bend of the gorgeous river, these impeccably elegant rooms seemingly hover on the water. They were traditionally designed in the Mon housing style and exude authenticity. After checking in, you will partake in a delicious lunch before making your way downstream the river via long-tailed boat. On this tour, you will learn about the history of Kwai and the traditions of the local tribe’s people. It will be an enriching and insightful end to the holiday, and one that will be worth capturing in great detail.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Home Sweet Home
dayInfo.description: As the sun peers over the horizon and begins to emblazon the sky, you will feel the warmth of a holiday well-spent. The final few hours after arriving in Bangkok will round off a truly adventurous and fun-filled holiday with your family. In no time, you will arrive home with many magical memories to reflect on, and before you know it, you will be wishing for another trip to the bustling city of Bangkok and its surroundings.

tourName: Family Vacation to Thailand: Adventures in Chiang Mai
placesVisited: Chiang Mai, Lisu Village, Mae Taeng, Pai
generalInfo: Your family will be inspired on this custom tailored tour through the landscapes of northern Thailand. You will be immersed in the spectacular wonders of nature and culture simultaneously. From remote hillside tribes deep within the forest to a tranquil town found near a seemingly endless canyon, you can ride down the river gliding over whitewater, and journey through the jungle alongside a herd of rescued elephants. Whether enjoying the comforts of a hammock or mountain biking along country roads, you will soon know that the majesty of Thailand is best experienced together.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai - Friendly Adventure
dayInfo.description: Chiang Mai is a city snug within the jungle; a place where the outside world has crept into modern culture and spread in a beautiful way making the expansive urban center feel more like the calm and warm streets of a town. The mountains overlook the cityscape while the trees add vibrant greenery sweeping through neighborhoods and along the old fortress that brings the past to life. You will be met at the airport by a private transfer and taken to your hotel where you can get situated, acclimating to the new city and the diverse streets. You will soon be picked up at your hotel by a traditional trishaw that will take you outside of the city walls to Wat Phra Singh, Temple of the Lion Buddha. The temple was constructed in the 14th century and continues to house two medieval Buddha statues. The complex is a major monastery accommodating around 700 monks who are always eager to practice their English with visitors. Step into Viharn Luang, the largest building on site, where you will find a three-aisled interior with a high red roof that stands out against the large white pillars. At the distant wall you can see a large Buddha cast in gold and copper seated in the enlightened position and glistening in the light. The monastic library seems small in comparison to the previous large hall but is interesting in its intricacy and architecture. The stone base helps protect manuscripts from pests and floods and is decorated with reliefs of Buddhist spirits and adorned with a wooden top tier. Continue onward to a White Hmong village tribe known as Chang Khien. The lush greenery wraps around you and the scent of fresh jungle lifts into the air. The children are shy, wrapped in their vivacious clothing of colorful tapestries shimmering against black cloth. Flowers often grow in vibrant, wild colors around you as you learn about the traditions of the village and the people that have persevered over the centuries of regime, border, and cultural changes. Just before dusk you will come to the steps of Doi Suthep, the mountain overlooking Chiang Mai and the jungle beyond. The temple at the summit was built in the 14th century. The cool breeze brushes through the trees as you come to the snake figures that guard the 300 steps which lead to the temple’s base and line the stairway. At the center of upper terrace you will find the great chedi , a later expansion of the original ornament where a gold plated temple resembles what was once considered the greatest temple in the area, Wat Phra That Haripunjaya. From the lower terrace you can watch the sunset blaze a classic orange over the horizon.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai - Breaking Free
dayInfo.description: The morning breaks over the horizon and sweeps across the city. Once awake you will have a delightful breakfast that will ready you for the day filled with rich coffee and sweet pineapple, fresh orange juice or coconut milk and so much more. You will pick up your mountain bike at Lisu Village and explore the sensational country roads and rural scenery which has turned the landscape into something on the fringe of myth. In the village you will witness traditions that date back over 300 years from the mountains of Tibet. The village sits along the rolling jungle landscape, often rising over the land on stilts and climbing up the hillside. Although the people are found in northern Thailand they maintain their traditions and culture that date back to their roots, which also means stemming the tide of western influences. Along the ride you will venture through the fabulous trees, which open up to effervescent fields, before arriving at the Mae Taeng River. Enter an elephant sanctuary, where you will meet a fantastic elephant that will be your new guide within the jungle sprawl. The elephant continues to be a treasured symbol of Thai culture, thought to bring luck and prosperity to the people. Elephants in the sanctuary are often rescued from the logging industry or from circus and riding camps. Visiting a sanctuary offers the remarkable experience of hand-feeding, petting, and trekking in the jungle alongside the herd, as well as the opportunity to bathe them. Once at the river’s edge, you will have an easy course in safety before boarding a rubber raft and enjoying the adventure downriver. The rush of the river, and of adrenaline, combine to bring the family together in an awesome display of nature, from whitewater to landscape. Follow your guide’s instructions as you dip into the water, run over slippery rocks, and slide down rapids. In the calm expanses, you can jump into the water for a refreshing soak, drifting next to the raft and downriver. Soon you will be ferried back to Chiang Mai but there is still plenty of day left to enjoy the energy that has brought you from village to river, elephant-side to raft-side.

dayInfo.title: Mae Kampong - Through the Treetops
dayInfo.description: Today you will venture outside of Chiang Mai and into the surrounding hills where a new cultural adventure awaits. Mae Kampong is an ecotourism project that was started to help local villagers create sustainable income without the need of forest encroachment. En route to the unique village you will stop at a local farmers’ market. The fresh produce sweeps through the aisles bringing with it the scent of bananas and lemongrass. Search for the best ingredients for the forthcoming meals in the village where traditional flavors of the region will come to quintessential life. Arrive at Mae Kampong to a warm welcome. A quick tour of the tea and coffee fields brings a view of the extensive landscape filled with lush crops and majesty that you are learning to associate with the northern scenery. Experience a traditional Thai massage that will revive and invigorate you from the days of endless wonderment. In the evening you will watch and learn as your host family demonstrates the proper techniques and steps to create a stunning home-cooked Thai dinner. The scent of chilies and coriander are enticing. The vegetables are marvelous in their brightness while the noodles maintain a succulence that brings diverse textures to the wonderful flavors at hand. For a special experience you have the option of taking part in the Flight of the Gibbon experience. Follow in the path of the birds and monkeys that soar through the treetops. There is nothing quite like walking over swinging bridges within the canopy, looking over the forest ground below and finding a place within the trees. Drift through the sky on zip-lines and meander along hanging bridges where incredible views of the jungle await and an unforgettable experience is inevitable.

dayInfo.title: Pai - Once More into the Woods
dayInfo.description: Your breakfast rises you blissfully from sleep where the recurring fragrance of fresh coffee gives a buzz to the morning air. You can visit the plantation that grows and ferments the tea, a local specialty, which has flavored drinks and foods, an often-overlooked tradition. The morning light is scented with fresh herbs, as today you will leave the Mae Kampong behind to venture deeper into the woods where the treasured town of Pai is hidden within the trees. The road winds and wisps through the jungle, taking you through the rising mountaintops and remarkable canopy. Pai could almost be described as a “one horse town,” more like a village with two main roads filled with lively cafes and surrounded by the lush mountains. The locals are friendly, quick to smile, and always ready to help. You have found a slower pace to life within the streets of Pai, where almost every café has a section of hammocks and the food is as important as air. In the evening the streets are lit from the local shops and food market that brings the sleepy town to life. The air is brushed with fried chicken and Pad Thai; the streets are crowded with excitement, from locals to visitors, all wanting a taste of the city and a touch of the exuberant nightlife.

dayInfo.title: Pai - Falling Surroundings
dayInfo.description: Pai is situated within the mountains and surrounded by flowing rivers that turn into tumbling waterfalls. There is an endless amount of natural wonders between the trees showing you what awe nature can provide. Before venturing off to see one of the many waterfalls just outside of town, you can see the locally famous Land Crack. You will immediately be sat at a table and given tremendous food, from lychee to peanuts, chilies to hibiscus juice, without being asked for anything in return. The land was once pristine farmland cultivated by the owner for commercial use; however one morning the owner awoke to a giant crack running through the center of the land. A small fence runs the length of the crack where you can look over into the crevice. Stroll next to the land crack and beyond to see the gorgeous landscape in the distance, the fragrant trees and pillow-like landscape, including a reflective lake. Whether en route to or from Pam Bok Waterfall, you can enjoy a relaxing moment with a friendly smile and the fresh air. Pam Bok Waterfall is a perfect representation of Pai, a spot easy enough to find if you are looking for it but hidden from those that are unaware of its beauty. The water tumbles down between towering rocks into a pool situated below. You can sit in the pool, nice and deep in the rainy season, and watch the water flow off of the high cliff. It is easy to enjoy yourself within the calm days of Pai, forgetting about the fast paced city streets and journeying at a much different pace which shows you equal amounts of beauty.

dayInfo.title: Pai - The Deep Bend
dayInfo.description: Leave the streets behind you as you venture out into nature once again coming into contact with Pai Canyon, a rich crevice that sinks into the earth giving way to pristine panoramas and opportunities for fabulous hikes. You can tour through the vistas for as long as you’d like, strolling along the canyon’s rim where you can look out over the canopy and into the rolling mountains along the horizon. The rails and outlooks are stone, curving around the rising trees in a natural trail. The sky is almost always tranquilly blue, absorbing the greenery, and draping over the landscape in a view that can never be forgotten. Whether standing at the edge of a cliff looking into the depths of the jungle below or letting yourself enjoy a cold drink with the speechless changing colors of the dusk, the day is yours to relax or explore at your leisure. Spend it exploring the canyon or enjoying the day at Pai Circus School, indulging in the best of your desires and your surroundings.

dayInfo.title: Pai - Adventurous Return
dayInfo.description: The morning sun rises over the quiet river that runs next to town. The scent of decadent breakfasts breaks through the streets. After a delicious meal you will leave the charming city behind, making your way back to Chiang Mai and eventually homeward bound. You have seen splendor within the trees and waterfalls, cultures and wildlife, from immaculate temples to marvelous vistas. Although your adventure will carry you home, you have traversed the tremendous northern reaches of Chiang Mai, found the enchanting city of Pai, and discovered unrivaled beauty with the people you care for most. If seven days isn't long enough for your family, Thailand tours can be extended. Browse the reviews of Thailand tours for additional ideas and to read traveler reviews.

tourName: Fascinating Flavors of Bangkok Tour
placesVisited: Bangkok
generalInfo: While Thailand is a tropical paradise that boasts pristine beaches and entertaining activities, the country is exceptionally well-known for its impeccable cuisine and age-old culinary traditions. The heart of Thailand, Bangkok, is where the culinary magic happens. It is a must-visit destination for food enthusiasts. From ancient recipe-inspired dishes to sophisticated Asian fusion food, the vibrant city offers a wealth of flavorful experiences. On this custom, 7-day trip to Bangkok, you will explore what makes Thai food so special in addition to meeting the marvelous people behind the county’s most coveted dishes. You will enjoy a taste of Thailand in true style.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – An Asian Fusion Arrival
dayInfo.description: Bangkok is a far-reaching city with a multitude of exceptional restaurants and authentic food markets. The city captures the traditional tastes of Thailand and perfectly fuses them with a sophisticated flair. In doing so, Bangkok’s premier restaurants and vibrant markets highlight Thailand’s significant food heritage and award-winning dedication to the culinary arts. As you approach the city, you will begin to realize how diverse the culinary scene is. Colorful stalls with queues of people will sprawl across the streets, and luxurious cafes and restaurants will sit atop striking skyscrapers. It is a surreal scene that you will soon explore in great depth. Your private transfer will deliver you to your 5-star hotel that will be located in the heart of the city. Here, you will have a panoramic view of the modern cityscape and a luxurious place to call home for the week. Shortly after checking in and becoming acclimated to the area, you will venture out on an art and cultural tour that will be paired with delightful food. During your private tour, your guide will take you to the city’s leading galleries and exhibitions. Here, you will brush shoulders with Asia’s creative talent and sip on elegant cocktails as you view stunning pieces of art. Afterward, you will journey to a creative gourmet restaurant that has pioneered Asian fusion food. You will delight in the upper-class meal before making your way home. Tonight, you will have a comfortable night’s rest as you prepare for the day of culinary adventure ahead.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A Taste of Tradition through the Khlongs
dayInfo.description: On your second day in Bangkok, you will delve into the rich tastes of traditional Thailand and explore the cultural heritage that underpins this local lifestyle. This immersive day of adventure will impart valuable insight about Bangkok’s history while giving you completely authentic eating experiences. Your private transfer will fetch you from your hotel after you indulge in a light and delicious snack. You will set off to the Chao Phraya Rivers calm and winding waters. From the pier, you will board a traditional long-tailed boat and journey through the heart of the city along the gentle river. Your boat will venture through the khlongs , which translate to canals, and briefly stop off at various destinations. Passing by vibrant markets and energetic lean-tos which sprawl across the river banks, you will have the opportunity to completely immerse yourselves in all things traditional about Thailand. From the comfort of your private boat, you will feel the wind breeze through your hair as you capture idyllic scenes of the surrounding city. At each pivotal stop, you will hop off the boat and taste the delectable, traditional cuisines that are served at Bangkok’s famous markets. You will catch the wafts of authentic Pad Thai , which is a distinguished stir-fried rice noodle dish, and hear the sizzle of Chicken Satay , which is skewered chicken pieces that are coated in a rich peanut sauce, as you leisurely zigzag through the colorful lanes. Trying as much of the eccentric and celebrated dishes, your taste buds will thoroughly be captivated throughout. After an elaborate exploration of Bangkok’s best riverside markets, your day will culminate with trips to the significant temples and monuments. You will also visit cultural highlights such as Wat Arun and The Reclining Buddha on this heritage tour. The magnificently striking Buddhist states and golden buildings capture the country’s spiritual history in great detail. They are sites to behold and witnessing these stunning sites will fill you with great admiration for the city. In the evening, you will transfer to your hotel for an hour or two at your leisure. You can spend the afternoon soaking up the Thai sun in style around your stunning pool. Then, you will transfer to a premier rooftop bar in the city center. An elevator trip to the top of the skyscraper will deliver you up into the clouds. You will have an uninterrupted, panoramic view of the entire cityscape from these great heights. The classy staff at this fine-dining establishment will ensure that your stay is spent in utter elegance. You will sip on exquisite cocktails and tuck into impeccable Thai dishes as the sun slowly sets over the horizon. The masterfully crafted food will be paired with a perfect sunset to bring the day to a perfect close.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Where Authenticity Meets Luxury
dayInfo.description: You will get your 3rd day underway in impeccable fashion. Your dignified, private transfer will meet you in your hotel lobby in the morning. Then, you will journey to one of the city’s delicious, gourmet breakfast cafes. The charming restaurant will serve up an intricate collection of local and international cuisine. You will spend some time basking in the delightful menu before selecting your preferred meal and gorgeous coffee to pair. If you are after a fine tea, then you can browse their selection of authentic blends. All of the sights and smells will sweep you away as the artistically presented dishes are a foodie’s dream. You will make yourself completely at home in this endearing spot while you delight in your 5-star breakfast. After your sumptuous breakfast spread, you will meet your private tour guide for a behind-the-scenes look at Bangkok’s leading cuisine. You will weave your way around the streets of the city center in search of the most extraordinary Thai meals. Your knowledgeable guide will share intriguing information about the city and its food heritage along the way. Shortly after, you will arrive at prime culinary destinations. Here, you will have the incredible opportunity to meet local, award-winning chefs and sample their revered dishes. The luxurious tour of Bangkok’s upper-class restaurants showcases the meticulous attention to detail and vast flavor profile which has made the location such a global hotspot for food. You will enjoy haute cuisine that has been inspired by traditional recipes, representing the cooks’ impressive skills in making the age-old classics and modern masterpieces. The tour will culminate with a splendid Afternoon Tea set inside one of the city’s esteemed restaurants. The old-world-inspired lounge boasts a first-class authentic tea ceremony that has been enjoyed by celebrities and dignitaries from around the world. In the evening, you will transfer to a high-end night market in the city. This will perfectly culminate the luxurious day of exceptional eating. The pristine market is home to distinguished fashion retailers and elite local creative stalls. You will enjoy the bustling market alongside an array of fashion-forward travelers and locals. While you are here, you will witness the far-reaching vistas of Bangkok by night from the top of a massive Ferris wheel. The cherry on top of this entertaining evening will be the superb restaurants that are scattered throughout the open-air market. You will finish off your divine evening with freshly caught seafood dishes that will be accompanied by breathtaking views of the Chao Phraya River.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Learn Bangkok's Coveted Culinary Secrets
dayInfo.description: Your fourth day of culinary exploration will begin in the early hours of the morning. After your restful sleep, you will privately transfer to an exuberant morning market for breakfast. The colorful market will be packed with busy stalls, and vibrant vendors will welcome you in with friendly smiles. Here, you will get a taste of the city’s booming commercial landscape. Thousands of hungry locals and eager travelers will line up at popular eateries and souvenir shops. You will leisurely peruse the many market lanes before setting your eyes on your culinary prize. Amid the bustling markets are rare foodie gems to explore. With an assortment of intriguing delicacies to try, you can tuck into as many Bangkok flavors as you will like. You may find yourselves sinking your teeth into a sweet papaya salad, ravishing a delicious Thai banana pancake, or tucking into a Pad Krapow Moo Saap, which is fried pork and basil. These are but a few remarkable finds that you can uncover during your morning market expedition. After filling up on all of the delicious, local treats, you will transfer to your hotel for an hour of leisure. Then, you will venture out to one of the city’s esteemed culinary schools to master the cuisine yourself. Set amongst an immaculately restored traditional house, the private culinary course will wow all of your senses. The intimate exploration of Thai cuisine will share riveting insight into its age-old recipes. With the help of revered chefs and teachers, you will learn the art of Thai food and you will also learn the traditional skills and recipes behind a few of the country’s most coveted meals. This endearing experience will completely invigorate your tastes buds while expanding your culinary knowledge. You will return home an improved chef with authentic recipes to entertain your future guests. Later this evening, you will transfer to a multiple Michelin Star awarded restaurant in Bangkok. The remarkable head chef and his talented team will serve you one of the highest-rated multiple course meals in the country. You will be hosted in true style as you dine like never before. You will be blown away by the restaurant’s divine dishes as you watch the sunset behind the towering cityscape. The award-winning dinner will mark the end to your perfect day of masterful meals.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Touring Thai Food by Tuk-Tuk
dayInfo.description: On day five of your trip, you will further explore the wonderful tastes of Thailand in and around the city center of Bangkok. This time, after a satisfying breakfast at your hotel, you will board a tuk-tuk . Tuk-tuks are a unique mode of transport that are primarily used within Southeast Asian countries. The truck-shaped tricycles are fitted with comfortable couches and brightly colored LED lights. They zip around the city in abundance and, as you sit in comfort with the wind blowing through your hair, you will have the opportunity to see Bangkok like never before. You can peer up at the imposing skyscrapers as you weave your way through the traffic in search of the finest traditional meals. Your cultured food guide will highlight more information about significant history within the areas that you visit before taking you to pivotal local spots. These gems will be off the beaten track, and you will experience much fewer tourists during your visit. You will sit down with the family-run business owners and share their favorite meals with them. You will capture the one-of-a-kind experience in all its glory as you snap pictures with the friends that you make and the extraordinary food that you try. The fun-filled day will come to a close later this afternoon, and your private tour guide will deliver you to your hotel. You can spend the afternoon lazing around the pool and catching up on relaxation time. In the early evening, you will visit an exquisite restaurant which boasts traditional Thai performances. While you tuck into 5-star meals, you will enjoy the flamboyant exhibits of traditional Thai dancing. You will take true delight in the culturally captivating creative displays and a rich gourmet dining experience. Afterward, you will meet your stately private guide for an exotic bar crawl. Here, you will encounter Bangkok’s premier bars and taste the finest Southeast Asian cocktails as you experience the city by night. The tour will give you an insightful look into the city’s nightlife and beverage scene. You will return to your luxury accommodation later this evening for a well-deserved night’s sleep.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Marvelous Meals on the River
dayInfo.description: You will enjoy a lovely breakfast at your hotel in the morning of your sixth day in Bangkok. After which, you will meet your private guide and transfer to the spirited Chinatown area. As you arrive in Yaowarat, you will be welcomed by a multitude of markets and eateries. The energetic destination boasts some of the city’s most magnificent street food. Your guide will usher you to Bangkok’s best-kept foodie secrets and recognized restaurants. The sounds of fresh fruit juices blending, and the smells of steaming buns baking will be just taste of the mouthwatering experience to come. You will meet the faces behind these delectable dishes as you delight all categories of your flavor profile. Later this afternoon, you will transfer to a nearby floating market. At this authentic Thai market, you will hop on and off long-tailed boats to browse the various goods they offer. Vendors will cheerfully sell fresh produce, clothes, and treasures. You will return home with many marvelous keepsakes of the trip and gifts for your family. Furthermore, you will enjoy tasty Thai treats and delicacies as you explore the floating market’s colorfully encompassed canals. In the evening, you will board a luxury riverboat for a journey along the Chao Phraya River. You will be served a delicious, multiple course meal that will be set amongst the stunning Bangkok sunset. As you enjoy the romantic candlelit dinner, you will take in the scenic splendor of the setting that surrounds you. You will have some time to reminisce about your exceptional culinary tour of this captivating city. After the intimate cruise and gourmet supper, you will transfer to your room for one last peaceful sleep in the Land of Smiles.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Charming Breakfast in the Land of Smiles
dayInfo.description: Your immaculate taste tour of Thailand will culminate with a trip to a revered breakfast restaurant along the Chao Phraya River banks. The charming cafe will serve a selection of local and international breakfasts. With sweeping views of the surrounding area and delectable dishes to satisfy your taste buds, you will conclude the luxurious expedition in style. All the while, your comfortable private transfer will keep your belongings safe. After thoroughly enjoying breakfast and capturing a final few images of bustling Bangkok, you will meet your private transfer and head to the airport. With gorgeous keepsakes, traditional recipes, a wealth of knowledge, and magnificent memories of the exquisite flavors, you will return home ecstatic to have visited Bangkok.

tourName: First Time Thailand Vacation for Seniors
placesVisited: Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai
generalInfo: Thailand is filled with wonderfully diverse experiences. Gibbons will softly hoot as you relax in a jungle spa, dancers will twirl as you dine on the Chao Phraya, chanting monks will provide a serene sunset atmosphere, and a helicopter flight will bring endless jungle vistas. Connect the finest handpicked highlights on this seven-day private tour for seniors, including the country’s best hotels and the full mix of history, culture, nature, spirituality, spa, and wilderness.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok - On the Chao Phraya River
dayInfo.description: Like all great cities, Bangkok is dominated by water. Meandering through the city’s heart is the Chao Phraya, which is one of the most famous rivers in all of Thailand. The river’s prominence is illustrated by the location of Bangkok’s most important historical attractions. Almost all of them are on the water, from the Royal Palace and Wat Po, to the towering Temple of Dawn that you will cruise past this afternoon. Public boats run up and down the river, bringing with them a riot of color and enthusiasm. Narrow long-tail boats carry everything from vegetables to monks. On the riverbank, you can still find iconic bamboo buildings, even if the other riverbank features contemporary hotels and towers. After an airport meet and greet plus time to relax in a five-star riverside hotel, you will immerse yourself in Bangkok with a river journey. You will cruise in luxury on a floating restaurant that is occasionally visited by royalty. Inside air-conditioned comfort, you will watch the city roll by. This as an excellent and effortless way to gain first impressions. You can take in all the wonderful colors and sights without being overawed by traffic and noise. Entertainment will be provided during intervals between courses, taking you on a journey to various Thai regions. Think dancing, singing, and theatrical shows that involve people and puppets. Lastly, you will be greeted by a sunset over the river that will illuminate the temples while casting blending colors across a changing city.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok - Temple Chanting and Puppet Shows
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will visit the Royal Palace. You can wander the Funeral Palace, gasp at the Throne Hall, step inside the Coronation Hall, and absorb the almost effortless splendor this temple has to offer. These two essential sights are complemented by the Emerald Buddha, a small and exquisite symbol that is the most important in Thai Buddhism. Getting around all three places will take approximately three hours. You will return to the hotel for lunch by the pool and relax, taking a break from the noise and heat. Bangkok can be an overwhelming city if you try to do too much, especially for senior travelers. It is better to go out exploring in the cooler and quieter morning hours before resting up along the river. Stay on the water this afternoon with an experience completely different from yesterday. This time you cruise in a long-tail boat, which is a narrow, streamlined vessel that can access the city’s back-canals and historic waterways. In this area, you pass floating markets and other long-tail boats laden with fruit and goods for the market. Bamboo and wooden houses may roll by, occasionally covering a water buffalo beneath them. One stop is a puppeteer, where you will admire the puppets as they narrate a poignant Bangkok tale. You will be back at the hotel by dusk time, and there are many good restaurants in your vicinity.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai - Spa Relaxation
dayInfo.description: After a relaxed morning, you will fly directly to Chiang Mai, the cultural heart of Thailand. From the window, you can spy mountains carpeted in the jungle, in addition to great expanses of rice paddies. Touching down, you will travel beyond the moat and through the old city gate, and into a mostly pedestrianized area of back-lanes and bicycles. Check into your spa hotel and head for an introductory one-hour treatment that is designed to knead out any travel knots or fatigue. This northern city has also been central to evolving Thai massages and spa techniques, which makes it inconceivable to come here and not enjoy the spa experience. This afternoon you will tour the old city and will cover key sights and stories that lay within the crumbling city walls. Visitors love Chiang Mai’s unpreserved feel. While some monuments are slowly being returned to their complete grandeur, you will get a real sense for old this city is, along with how it was cut off from the rest of Siam for most of its history. Evenings are always relaxed here, so after the guided tour you can try one of the small terraced restaurants, or you can take a walk through the night market.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai - Wooden Villages and Evening Ceremony
dayInfo.description: Culture thrives in the thick jungle surrounding Chiang Mai. This remote and somewhat inaccessible land is the home to a dozen different hill tribes, each with a culture that is quite distinct from the city itself. Influence comes from all over, and some of the hill tribes have populations in neighboring countries as well. The most numerous are the Karen, who are internationally famous for their long-necked women, particularly their elaborate neck decoration that sets them apart from others. Other hill tribes are not as glamorous or immediately photogenic as the Karen. With a local guide, you will visit three different hill tribes and meet with a community leader in each. This is not a point-and-shoot camera exercise, as there are certain hill tribe villages that invite tourists purely to have their photo taken in exchange for a fee. Instead, you visit traditional communities that provide an eye-opening look into a life that is beyond modern comprehension. Exploring how these cultures are changing is another vital part of the experience. Back in Chiang Mai, there is time for another spa treatment before heading to Doi Suthep, which is a glowing temple atop a hill above the city. There are hundreds of steps to the summit but don’t worry if you can’t manage them, it is still impressive to check out the atmosphere and chedi at the site’s base. You will witness monks chanting, bells ringing, prayer wheels spinning, and a sunset ceremony that sends incense spiraling through the air.

dayInfo.title: Golden Triangle - Helicopter Over Northern Thailand
dayInfo.description: You will travel in style this morning as you rise above Chiang Mai in a helicopter. Jungle stretches beneath you as you fly north, and trees cover a seemingly endless wave of rolling hills and peaks. It only grows denser as you fly north, especially when you come close to the border with Myanmar and Laos. From up here, you will really appreciate how Thailand’s hill tribes were able to preserve their culture. Touch down in the Golden Triangle, which is a mysterious stretch of land where three countries meet. Elephants can be heard as they trumpet from somewhere in the trees. Monkeys may swing past, as well. You will land at Thailand’s finest jungle retreat, a place of contemporary comfort in the most magical of settings. A guide will provide an orientation after lunch and will take you along the river in search of gibbons. The walking trails are also suitable for all fitness levels, ranging from full day hikes to ten-minute trails. This is a perfect way to immerse yourself in nature, so relax and enjoy the breathtaking scenery.

dayInfo.title: Golden Triangle - Meeting With Elephants
dayInfo.description: You will wake up to the choral soundtrack of birds and monkeys, and then eat breakfast as mist rises from the river’s surface. You will then cruise even deeper into the jungle, following sounds and smells of gibbons and exotic blue-winged birds. The cool morning hours are best for a local safari when the primates are most active, and you can walk amongst the trees. From 11 am to 2 pm it is as if the jungle goes to sleep. Animals rest, sounds evaporate, and you can relax in the spa, or wherever strikes your fancy. This afternoon you will meet jungle giants, as you join an elephant herd that lives around the camp. These are not working elephants, and they have free reign to explore the jungle; however, they are fed and cared for by hand, which makes them open to regular human contact. The experience can be as active or as laid-back as you wish, from simply admiring elephants meandering through the jungle, to feeding them fruit and receiving a soft trunk pat on your head. If you are feeling very active, then you can also add a border town trip into today’s itinerary, or you can take a boat to Mae Salong to explore a peculiar market culture that is nothing like what you have seen in Thailand.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Rai - Departure
dayInfo.description: You will travel out of the jungle after breakfast, first by boat, and then by road to the nearest city, Chiang Rai. Your seven days in Thailand ends at Chiang Rai International Airport.

tourName: Gastronomic Thailand Vacation: Thai Flavors & More
placesVisited: Bangkok, Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Hua Hin, Pattaya, Nakhon Ratchasima
generalInfo: Though Thai cuisine is sought-after as a whole, its dishes encompass many different cultural influences that are represented across its immense, tropical landscape. The zenith of culinary influence is shared within the Northern regions of the country, and this tour is customized to lead you to these beloved foodie destinations. You will explore the wonderfully diverse and unique flavors that are coveted worldwide and experience the finer aspects of Thai cuisine in addition to the traditional approaches to meal preparation. Indulge in this luxurious, 14-day adventure of culinary highlights across Northern Thailand.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Flavors of Modernity and Tradition
dayInfo.description: With a cityscape that features grandiose skyscrapers that are topped with celebrated restaurants and streets that come to life with exuberant markets, Bangkok is a sight to behold that will serve as the finest first destination of your foodie tour through Northern Thailand. Your window seat will afford you views of the cultural landmarks that you will soon explore as you weave your way through Bangkok’s culinary hotspots. The energetic atmosphere will embrace you as soon as you have touched down and transferred to your accommodation. An in-depth exploration of Bangkok’s delectable cuisine will begin shortly after you have unpacked your things. Your experienced guide will collect you in a spacious Tuk-Tuk , which is a traditional open-air vehicle that originated in Southeast Asia, and transfer you through the city on a behind-the-scenes food tour. The soundtrack of honking horns and shuffling feet will complement your journey as you slip through the infamous Bangkok traffic toward your first stop. An unassuming stall will sit alongside the street, and from yards away, you will catch the wafts of frying garlic. Drawing you closer and closer, those wafts will form stronger aromas as an authentic Pad Thai , which is a traditional rice noodle dish with meat, is brought to life and plated. You can sink your teeth into what is claimed to be the best Pad Thai in Thailand as your revered chef attends to other hungry visitors. After your meal, your chef will join you for a cup of Thai iced tea, and you will have the opportunity to delve deeper into their time-tested traditions. You will continue to more adored local eateries that are each firmly rooted in ancient Thai culinary practices for a rigorous exploration of the wonderful flavors that make up the cuisine. The following day will bring with it a spectacular sunrise over the sky-high cityscape and will embellish the streets in a golden glow. Your private guide will meet you in the morning and will lead you on an inspiring cultural and food tour. After breakfast, you will wrap around toward the multi-colored, pottery encrusted walls of Wat Arun, which is an imposing temple that stands tall within the heritage hub of Bangkok. You will be able to feel the spiritual ambiance as it resonates from the ornately decorated walls while you wander through sacred buildings and peer into the elaborate main hall. You will continue to learn more about the endearing history at a select set of distinguished temples before setting off on a luxurious food tour of the cities classiest establishments. During your tour, you will luxuriate amongst the clouds at white-lined, coated tables as sophisticated meals are served to your table and paired with world-class wines. Michelin-stars cannot even begin to capture the premium atmosphere and exceptional taste that is exalted by the restaurants in which you will delight. This will bring your stay in Bangkok to an idyllic close.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Northern Capital Bursting with Cultural Cuisine
dayInfo.description: Bangkok will bring you closer to the authenticity of Thai cuisine, but for an absolutely authentic taste, you will transfer to the Northern Capital of Chiang Mai. It is within the limits of this flourishing city where you will stumble upon some of the most flavorsome dishes that have been mastered through years of tradition. What is more is the city sits snuggly below the striking Doi Suthep Mountain, which is a must-visit highlight on any tour through Northern Thailand. In saying so, your expedition to these northern regions will both showcase the wonderful flavors of the cuisine in addition to providing an immersion into the country’s profound history. After your daily experiences, you will be able to retire to the confines of your secluded suite, which will be located at a distinguished resort that is tucked away in the luscious greenery that blankets the Doi Suthep Mountain. Marvelous vistas will welcome you, and the chorus of wildlife songs will surround your room as you unwind in nature’s paradise. From your balcony, you will be able to hear the sizzle of the grill as it fires up in the evening, and a brisk walk to the poolside restaurant will reveal the sprawling views that you will admire alongside a delicious spread of gourmet Thai BBQ. Rather than reclining to the sunrise on your patio during your first morning in Chiang Mai, you will transfer to a nearby hot-air balloon launch field for an unrivaled sunrise spectacle. The private balloon will kick into gear and lift you well into the sky for soaring vistas of the countryside. Chiang Mai will come to life below you, and you will capture images of markets that are bursting with colorful energy and mountain ranges that are towering over the endless stretches of land. A glass of prestigious Champagne and an award-winning breakfast awaits when you return from your voyage in the clouds. Afterward, you will delve into the heritage of Chiang Mai as you journey to sacred temples and insightful museums that are dotted across its expanse. Your tour will culminate atop Doi Suthep Mountain, where you will peruse the awe-inspiring golden statues that glisten from the sun’s reflection and stare out across the 360-degree views of Northern Thailand. Finally, you will climb a few steps to a stand-out restaurant that will provide further panoramic vistas for your merriment. Here, you will delight in a gourmet dinner by candlelight, and nothing will interrupt your view of the shining stars in the black, unpolluted, sky. You will be whisked away by the charm in every aspect of this dining experience from the expertly plated, modern meals to the Siamese-inspired adornments.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Rai – Local Dishes of Pure Authenticity
dayInfo.description: Rural, secluded, quiet, and shrouded in cultural heritage, Chiang Rai offers a resplendent escape from the bustle of Northern Thailand’s major city destinations and will highlight what makes these less-frequented landscapes special. Your voyage from Chiang Mai will be speedy as the rolling green hills of Chiang Rai lie a short few hours away. This will give you the opportunity to soak up the splendid countryside ambiance. You will arrive at an upscale resort, where opulence extends far beyond the furnishings of your elegant villa to the top-tier amenities, including a dazzling poolside setting and luxurious wellness spa. You can luxuriate on loungers around the pool before you appreciate your first traditional Thai massage that will be performed by an experienced masseuse who uses only the highest quality essential oils. You will then culminate your evening with a deluxe dining experience at the resort, which will be presented by celebrated chefs who will awaken your senses with their trailblazing takes on long-established recipes. You will meet your knowledgeable guide the following morning and venture to the banks of the Kok River, where you will board a traditional, wooden riverboat that is bound for a nearby village. Your boat will gently glide down the peaceful river, and you will leave the world behind as buildings give way to the wilderness. Birds will burst into melodies while the rustle of leaves hints at sightings of rare jungle cats. There is a wealth of wildlife to see as you meander along the river to the foot of a hill, which you will have to hike up to reach the village. You will find yourselves among a group of friendly locals who are dressed in various garments to reflect their unique culture in colorful fashion. Surrounded by luscious foliage, their homes stand as wooden constructs that have been built on stilts with thatch roofs. In similar taste, lean-tos, which serve as market stalls, jut out onto the dirt roads that wind through the village. A tranquil atmosphere exudes from the humble village, and it will fill you with great respect for the antiquated lifestyle that remains so prevalent in these parts. A family will invite you into their home, where you will delight in the age-old culinary arts of authentic ethnic Thai cuisine. Everyone in the village plays their part, and this is no different for visitors. You will immerse yourselves completely as you lend a helping hand in preparing the delectable dishes that you will soon dine on together, while stories are shared and laughter follows conversations, which will all be aided by your bilingual tour guide.

dayInfo.title: Hua Hin – Seafood Shines in this Seaside Town
dayInfo.description: Hua Hin, which is situated just south of Bangkok, was designated as a luxurious getaway destination for Bangkok residents some years back and has since become a booming seaside town with a grand design. It features stretching, soft sand beaches that are lined with shady palm trees, and the shores are flanked by immaculate resorts that boast world-class villas. You will retreat to one of these five-star accommodations for a few nights of regal treatment and will delight in the taste of Hua Hin’s renowned seafood throughout your leisurely stay. The days are yours to enjoy at your own pace. Whether you wish to weave your way down to the pearl-white sands and swim in the warm sea or stroll through the streets to thriving markets, your experiences will leave nothing to be desired as you luxuriate under the sun. You will settle into gourmet dining establishments for delectable seafood dishes. The scent of freshly caught king prawns and the salty flavors of oysters as they are drizzled with hot sauce will captivate your taste buds and noses. Meanwhile, a messy but divine crab curry will have your mouth watering for more, and the seafood hotpots will leave you yearning for another spoonful. There will be an array of exquisite dishes to tuck into that are tailored to the finer palates, making your food-orientated stay in Hua Hin astounding on every level. To top off your stay in glorious style, you will bask in the beautiful, seaside vistas while you endure an invigorating spa treatment at a first-class wellness resort. With a collection of curated treatments to choose from, you will have no trouble finding the right remedy for you before packing your things and preparing for your next destination feeling utterly rejuvenated.

dayInfo.title: Pattaya – Luxuriance on the Gulf of Thailand
dayInfo.description: Across the Gulf of Thailand lies Pattaya, which is a quiet fishing village that has been turned into an extravagant city due to an influx of affluent tourists. Much like Hua Hin, Pattaya represents the zenith of sophisticated influence in Thailand and will showcase the country’s palatial style in almost all of your experiences. Highlighting this endearing appeal is your stately suite, which is located within a premier resort that overlooks the emerald stretch of sea that you will have crossed by speed boat. This idyllic view will welcome you to the beach, and in the next few days, you may set up under the shade of a nearby tree and relax in utmost content. In the evening, you will be led out to Walking Street for a taste of the country’s flamboyant nightlife before reaching a voguish restaurant for a magnificent Thai meal. There are a number of iconic temples that are dotted around Pattaya, and the following morning will be dedicated to uncovering the mysteries that lie behind their grandiose constructions. Wat Phra Yai consists of a momentous Buddhist image only a short climb up a stairway that is encompassed by forest groves. The statue itself is embellished in gold and looks over the entire stretch of Pattaya, thus providing many memorable photo opportunities. You will then seemingly travel back in time as you trace back the roots of Thai-Chinese influence at Khao Chi Chan museum, where hundreds of alluring figures pay tribute to the influential religious deities. An intricately designed palace houses the fascinating exhibits and serves as a spectacle in itself. Your intriguing day trip will conclude on a traditional long-tailed boat as you circle an authentic floating market in search of delicious delicacies to fill your bellies. Pattaya is an exceptional place to visit for its pleasant aura of luxury and its neighboring wildlife beauty. Your final day will be spent discovering the enchanting environment that this region is famous for, and your tour will begin within the award-winning gardens of Nong Nooch Tropical Botanical Gardens. Maze-like displays of vibrant flowers will lead you through the pristine fields of rich greenery where hedges have been shaped in meticulous detail. The smell of freshly cut grass and indigenous plant life will push and pull you in all directions across the flawless gardens. A contemporary restaurant awaits your arrival later today, and here, you will dine to your heart’s content. Gorgeous meals embody the passionate devotion to haute cuisine, and the aromas will blow you away. You can allow the delicate flavors to stir up feelings of admiration for the revered chefs who will prepare the stellar, multiple-course meal for you to bring your stay to a riveting close.

dayInfo.title: Nakhon Ratchasima – A Distinctly Distinguished Wine Tasting Experience
dayInfo.description: Nakhon Ratchasima is one of the major cities of the Isan, Northeastern, region of Thailand. The city is steeped in heritage from its engrossing museums to entrancing temples and from its mesmerizing markets to its absorbing parks. Furthermore, the city is home to some of the finest Isan cuisine, and your stay will highlight the distinct flavors that separate it from other culturally-varied dishes. To maximize the splendor of your stay, you will escape to a secluded suite within a stellar hotel that boasts outstanding facilities. Here, you will indulge in the tastes of Isan as you venture to a sought-after dining establishment that has mastered the techniques that underpin this specialty cuisine. Your esteemed chef will curate their most beloved meals for an unobstructed immersion into the sensory-awakening flavors of these signature dishes, including Isan-style grilled chicken and papaya salad. Though wine production is not as popular in Thailand as it is in destinations such as France or South Africa, Nakhon Ratchasima stands out as a brilliant winemaking region in Southeast Asia. The luscious valleys in which classy estates have established themselves offer agreeable terrain and a worthy climate that has given rise to the production of an array of sublime blends and vintages. Accompanied by an experienced tour guide, you will journey to the famous estates for exceptional wine pairings with terrific Thai-fusion meals. Your tour will reveal the distinct differences in their wines and showcase the meticulous manufacturing processes that are used in these regions. You will have the unique opportunity to draw contrasts between the varied wine cultures and appreciate the craftsmanship that is prevalent in Nakhon Ratchasima. This off-the-beaten-path experience will perfectly culminate your captivating, gastronomical tour through Northern Thailand.

tourName: Gems of Thailand’s Islands for Two Itinerary
placesVisited: Bangkok, Koh Samui, Koh Tao, Koh Phangan, Koh Racha Yai, Koh Lipe, Phuket
generalInfo: From teasing your palates at Michelin-starred restaurants to soaring across the crystal-clear waters of the sea, there is much to keep the two of you brimming with smiles during your two-week stay. Celebrated for its alluring garden of forested islands that peak out of stretching marine seascapes, Thailand’s islands yearns to be explored by adventurous couples. Observe the spellbinding displays of unspoiled environment and be absorbed by the riveting traditional lifestyle.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Please Your Palates
dayInfo.description: After arriving in Bangkok, a driver will be waiting to transfer you from the airport to your luxury accommodation on the banks of the Chao Phraya River. Locals will shuffle along the sidewalks like ants as cars slowly idle through the bumper to bumper traffic. The energy will be electrifying, and you may delight in an exciting introduction should you wish to stroll through the neighborhood. Whether rising to the clouds for a rooftop dinner that is curated by one of the country’s celebrated chefs or cruising across the Chao Phraya River on board an ornate boat that is fitted with a 5-star restaurant, you can rest assured that your first night in Thailand will provide a picture-perfect scene.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Beachside Bliss
dayInfo.description: In the morning, you will transfer to Koh Samui. Forget airport queues and baggage claims because you will soar across the sea in the repose of a private jet. Upon your arrival, you will make your way to a luxurious resort on the island’s sloping headland. Your villa will be complete with a swimming pool that will appear to hang over the cliff. There will be an extraordinary feeling of isolation among the spectacular landscape that surrounds your suite. There are fewer better ways to unwind than on the soft, white sands of Thailand’s world-renowned beaches. You can pack a good book and some sunblock in your day bag before transferring to the cataloged shores of Koh Samui.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Surreal Spas and Yoga
dayInfo.description: This morning, you can share a cup of bold coffee and delight in a sumptuous breakfast before you return to your room to map out your day. Opulence extends beyond the brilliant beaches and is rolled up into revitalizing experiences you may wish to indulge in today. These world-famous experiences include award-winning spa treatments and awakening yoga sessions, which are two distinct activities that will elevate your expedition to new heights. You will be spoiled for choice with several treatments that range from full-body essential oil to stone massages. In the afternoon, you will continue to focus on your bodies as you partake in a professionally guided yoga session.

dayInfo.title: Koh Tao – Sun-Bathing and Snorkeling
dayInfo.description: To reach Kah Tao, you will take a private speed boat with an expert captain. You will arrive and unpack your bags in a finely decorated seaside suite that will highlight luxury with its classy furnishings and unhindered views. Once you have settled it, you will return to the beach, where your captain will be patiently awaiting your return. Today, you will set sail for Koh Tao’s tropical sandbar beaches. Your tour will be designed with your needs in mind, allowing you to adjust activities depending on your mood.

dayInfo.title: Koh Tao – Discover the Island
dayInfo.description: There are fewer better spectacles than the sunrise on Koh Tao, and you can wake up early in the morning to watch it from your balcony or the peaks of a prized viewpoint. Today will be left open for you to decide how you want to spend it. There are many activities to choose from if sightseeing and exploring is your preference, and an insider guide will be ready to collect you for a day of discovery if it fits your schedule. Koh Tao is home to a collection of exalted restaurants that are famous for their 5-star cuisine. You can retreat to a quiet table on the deck of one of these establishments in the evening for a multiple-course dinner that will be designed to exhilarate your palates.

dayInfo.title: Koh Pha Ngan – Two Days of Diving
dayInfo.description: With its claim to fame being a monthly full moon party, Koh Pha Ngan draws thousands of travelers to its shores for an astonishing celebration of dazzling proportions. If you are up for an incredible night out, then planning your trip to align with this experience is a must. The island is large enough to escape the music-thumping night should you be there during the occasion. Beyond the event, Koh Pha Ngan is an essential stop on your tour because it is home to some of the most admired scuba diving destinations in Thailand. Your two days here will be designed to bring out the best of the sea, allowing you to immerse yourselves in the awe-inspiring sights that await below the surface of the water.

dayInfo.title: Koh Racha Yai – Dinner for Two
dayInfo.description: Phuket is an intermediary destination en route to Koh Racha Yai, and after a brief flight from Koh Samui, you will board an exemplary catamaran for a sail across the Andaman Sea. Once a premium day trip destination from Phuket, Koh Racha Yai has gained popularity as an exceptional overnight location that features an exquisite, luxury resort, which is where you will spend your nights in unbridled style. After a long day of traveling, there is little that is more pleasing than taking the afternoon and evening to yourselves. With an assortment of fine dining options to choose from, you may submerge yourselves in the wondrous flavors of Thai cuisine in a manner that appeals to you most.

dayInfo.title: Koh Racha Yai – Encounter Eco-Tourism
dayInfo.description: Immersing yourself in the indulgence of Thailand’s revered island paradises is easy on this getaway, but there is an unmistakable fulfillment in encountering the modest constituents of Koh Racha Yai’s valued eco-tourism. The local islanders have gone above and beyond to ensure that the opulent treatment of their guests is built on the back of sustainable and ethical practices. Water buffalos graze the illustrious grounds, and coconut plantations rise between the dense jungle that covers most of the untamed island, dropping refreshing coconuts in which you can indulge. Locally trodden dirt paths connect the larger landscape and offer access to all of these admirable sights.

dayInfo.title: Koh Lipe – A Tucked Away Island
dayInfo.description: Today, you will check-in to your deluxe accommodation on the coastline of Koh Lipe after a boat trip across the Andaman Sea. Koh Lipe features many of the centerpiece attractions of Thailand’s islands, such as white-sand beaches and luscious stretches of jungle. Before you get too cozy on Koh Lipe, you may venture out with a knowledgeable tour guide to the neighboring island of Koh Adang. Koh Adang boasts impeccable viewpoints, and hikes up the mountain slopes will reveal panoramas of both this island and Koh Lipe. If you trek further inland, accompanied by your guide, you will reach the rocky terraces of Pirate Waterfall.

dayInfo.title: Koh Lipe – Otherworldly Experiences
dayInfo.description: Snorkeling, kayaking, scuba diving, and hiking are mainstay activities on Koh Lipe. If you desire to dabble in these entertaining activities, then you will not be disappointed because Koh Lipe reflects the distinguished marine sightseeing opportunities that are representative of Thailand’s famous seaside destinations. You may partake in any of these thrilling activities during your final day in Koh Lipe. There are a select few islands where bioluminescent plankton can be found, and Koh Lipe is one of them. As you submerge your bodies in the warm water, the area around you will glow with blue light as you may have seen in the classic film The Beach .

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Phuket’s Striking Landmarks
dayInfo.description: Today, you will venture to Phuket. The journey will be fast-paced, sending you across the Andaman Sea efficiently while still affording you glimpses of the seaside scenery. Your suite will highlight the charming ambiance that travelers have come to expect during a stay in Phuket. Should you yearn to witness the island’s highlights from a unique perspective, then you can indulge in a flight later this afternoon. A private helicopter tour will send you soaring above fabled landmarks, such as the Big Buddha Statue and Phang Nga Bay. Afterward, you will celebrate with a toast of champagne and a gourmet lunch that will be hosted by a Thai chef.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – The Flavors of Thailand
dayInfo.description: You will spend your final full day in Thailand indulging in the cuisine that is featured in top travel lists and exalted foodie documentaries across the globe. You will also uncover every inch of the venerated flavors, which constitute the timeless meals that individuals flock here to try as you are escorted to where celebrated dishes are prepared without flaw. From the biting spices of steaming red curries to char-grilled seafood, your tour of the colorful markets and revered restaurants will propel you into the depths of Thai cuisine and the varied complexities that constitute it.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Departure
dayInfo.description: Your flight out of Thailand will leave from Phuket International Airport, and you should have just enough time to catch one last breakfast before you make your way to the airport. You can settle in for the morning at an esteemed cafe and let the wafts of coffee invigorate your minds and bodies. You can treat yourselves to a hearty meal to give Thailand a glorious goodbye before you hop in your air-conditioned vehicle for a welcomed, comfortable transfer with plenty of time to spare to catch your international flight.

tourName: Heritage Highlights Tour of Northern Thailand
placesVisited: Bangkok, Kanchanaburi, Mae Hong Son, Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai, Sukhothai, Pattaya
generalInfo: Thailand’s Northern regions encompass intriguing stories that date back centuries, and these will be unearthed as you explore the marvelous, humanmade, and natural relics in which these sought-after cities pride themselves. You will uncover the country’s iconic wartime past in addition to discover the fascinating cultures that reside in rural destinations that rarely visited by tourists. Every aspect of this voyage is customized to help you expose the gripping heritage that resonates from Thailand’s collection of enthralling sites, and you will immerse yourselves in historically-focused experiences unlike any other.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A Fascinating Look into the Spirit of Thailand
dayInfo.description: Brimming with cultural highlights and teeming with luxurious experiences, Bangkok is a pivotal first stop on your 12-day heritage tour across the Northern region of Thailand. The city comes to life with an abundance of enthralling opportunities to delve into the country’s renowned cuisine and to learn more about the ancient traditions in which local lifestyles are firmly rooted. Shortly after you have landed and privately transferred to your luxurious, 5-star accommodation in the heart of the city, you will be provided with an unrivaled tour of Bangkok’s age-old temples Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, you will arrive at the entrance to Wat Arun, which is an imposing temple that stands over 70 meters tall alongside the Chao Phraya River. Decorated with multi-colored porcelain, the temple was conceptualized by King Taskin centuries ago when he arrived at the break of dawn. Wat Arun is both an impressive display of the country’s meticulous attention to architectural detail and a heritage site of tremendous value. Your tour will continue with a leisurely cruise across the Chao Phraya River to the gold plated, 150-foot long reclining Buddha image within the elaborate walls of Wat Pho. This incredible spectacle, along with the intricately crafted statues and murals that are positioned around the sacred complex, resonates an aura of spiritual significance and provides a wealth of intriguing photo-worthy moments to celebrate your cultural exploration. Afterward, you will board a regal cruise liner for a gourmet, multiple-course dinner by candlelight as you gently glide across the Chao Phraya River and immerse yourselves in the wondrous flavors of gourmet Thai cuisine.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Discover Dazzling Displays of Arts and Crafts
dayInfo.description: As the sun rises, so do the locals, and morning markets will erupt into a chorus of shuffling feet and sizzling woks. With only the aromas of delectable delicacies to guide you, you will lose yourselves in the alluring chaos that oozes from this unique, Southeast Asian experience. After you have lined your stomachs with various traditional treats, you will be led to the Jim Thompson House for an engrossing look into Jim Thompson’s iconic life. The American entrepreneur was responsible for reviving the Thai silk industry and introducing it into the world’s leading fashion institutions of the 20th Century. The museum pays tribute to his influential story and within it, enveloped by its immaculate blend of Asian and Western design, you will witness adored artifacts and uncover the mysteries that shrouded the end of his life. Your immersive discovery of Asian arts and craft will proceed as you arrive at premier art galleries that are sprawled across the city. Prominent establishments such as Bangkok’s Museum of Contemporary Art and Bangkok Art and Culture Centre will bring you closer than ever to the revered talent born and raised in Thailand, and their stunning pieces serve as a window into the country’s captivating culture.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A Trip to Thailand’s Wartime Past
dayInfo.description: Situated just beyond Bangkok’s borders lies the iconic town of Kanchanaburi, which is an area that played a significant role in the country’s dramatic wartime past. You will embark across the unspoiled countryside within a private train cabin for unparalleled perspectives of the splendid, rural settings. With your windows drawn and the breeze against your face, you will begin to feel the often overwhelming city energy slip away behind the vistas of luscious grasslands that unfold toward the horizon. Shortly after you have arrived, you will visit Death Railway, Bridge over the River Kwai, and the Allied War Cemetery, which is a compelling group of activities known as the Kanchanaburi trio. Each experience will fill you with an appreciation for the country’s tumultuous past as the sights, sounds, and stories in which they are steeped showcase bygone days that are still held in high regard. Before you make your way back to Bangkok for a Michelin-style dining experience that is hosted by an award-winning chef, you will calmly cruise along the River Kwai on a bamboo raft. This will culminate your day trip in authentic style and will share plenty of idyllic images to take along the way.

dayInfo.title: Mae Hong Son – Regal Retreat of Raw Natural Beauty
dayInfo.description: Laid-back lounging amidst engrossing natural wonders make Mae Hong Son an unavoidable destination for your tour, and its close proximity to Myanmar means that you will stumble on cultural highlights that are rarely shared by other regions of Northern Thailand. Overlooking the Pai River and encompassed by luxuriant trees, your secluded and ultra-chic resort awaits your arrival. A symphony of wildlife will enwreathe your intimate suite, which will feature a thatched roof and traditional decor, making it reminiscent of a humble ethnic Thai house while retaining the opulence of a world-class accommodation. You can use the afternoon to relax in utter style as you revel in the tropical paradise that you can view from your private balcony. The resort’s posh restaurant will be open for the evening, and you can catch wafts of expert dishes as they are prepared and you weave your way through the picturesque wilderness walkways. You will settle in at a comfortable table that affords vistas of a creek while the soundtrack of flowing water and singing birds provide a peaceful atmosphere to dine.

dayInfo.title: Mae Hong Son – Culture beyond Borders
dayInfo.description: As the sun ascends, you will be invited to join in on morning almsgiving with the local monks at your resort. Almsgiving sets will be provided by your resort, and saffron-robed monks will appreciate your participation with warm smiles, providing you with a pleasantly uplifting start to your day of adventure. After a mouthwatering breakfast, your private guide will transfer you to riveting destinations around Pai, and you will immerse yourselves in the wonderful wilderness for which the town is famous. You will trek across the red sand cliffs of Pai Canyon, which is a rugged geological spectacle that will have you peering over narrow ledges to the depths of the forest-covered, canyon floors. Your voyage will continue to Pam Bok Waterfall, which is a canyon-fall whereby you may dive off of the staggering cliffs into a refreshing pool of water below. Afterward, your fluent guide will take you to an authentic Shan Village for an afternoon of cultural exploration with the local people. The Shan people originate from Myanmar, but communities now also inhabit parts of Laos and Northern Thailand. Their way of life is simple, and their cuisine is unique. You will be invited into a local home for an authentic Shan family meal, where you will partake in a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity of helping to create these long-established dishes. You will learn more about their lifestyle and trace back the culture’s roots as you connect with the residents over hearty food within a wooden house. You will be humbled by their friendly natures and return to your resort with invaluable insight into this age-old culture.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – An Educational Exploration of Outstanding Conservation
dayInfo.description: Chiang Mai is another essential Northern Thailand destination on this handcrafted tour because it boasts a collection of gripping, cultural landmarks that you will be inspired to visit. Though a popular place to explore, the city does not exude the same hustle and bustle as Bangkok. There are an array of activities that are off the beaten path, and you will be delighted because you will be staying within the comfort of a palatial resort that is nestled below the striking Doi Suthep Mountain. Your first afternoon will bring you closer than ever to nature and will highlight the importance of animal conservation, which is held in extreme regard at a local ethical elephant sanctuary. Many elephant centers pride themselves in offering rides, but this practice is incredibly immoral and frowned upon at the sanctuary that you will visit. Rather than riding them, you will have the privilege to spend quality time with the coveted creatures as you help feed and bathe them to a luscious jungle backdrop. Highlighting animal welfare throughout your tour, you will cherish this virtuous experience for years to come and leave with precious insights that you may pass on to others. Your evening will exemplify these moral standards as you transfer to an environmentally-conscious, gourmet restaurant for a taste of Thai cuisine that is rooted in conscious, culinary practices. Your celebrated chef will join you for a meal, and you will learn more about their efforts to benefit the community and environment.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Across the Roof of Thailand
dayInfo.description: Featuring an immense mountain range that is home to the highest peak in Thailand, Doi Inthanon National Park, which is also known as “the roof of Thailand,” is a picturesque stretch of land that is blanketed by evergreen rainforests. Here, hundreds of bird species perch themselves in the towering trees, troops of gibbons leap across the canopies, and a multitude of indigenous mammals move through the shrubbery in search of food. There is much to see and do across the expanse of the park, and you will discover the untamed allure as you hike through the diverse topography. You will find yourselves atop mighty summits where the park unravels well into the distance, below the pounding silver waters of its majestic falls, and among the varied wildlife that inhabits the jungle. You will fly through your memory cards as you, utterly in tune with nature, capture endearing images to the soundtrack of fervent fauna and the bitter-sweet fragrances of blossoming Siamese sakura flowers.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Enlightening Expedition to Chiang Rai
dayInfo.description: Your last day near the Northern borders of Thailand will lead you to Chiang Rai, which is a mountain that is flanked by a city of archaic magnitude. Though sought-after for many reasons, it is a modest destination that remains off the well-trodden paths of the likes of Chiang Mai, and thus, represents a heritage that is not as frequently explored by the masses. Your day trip will begin at the foot of Wat Rong Khun, which was aptly nicknamed the White Temple because it is entirely emblazoned in white. The temple is no less of a spectacle as the golden, embellished Wats of Bangkok as it comprises of extraordinarily detailed sculptures and statues that glimmer under the sweltering Thai sun. These decorous features are attributed to local artist Chalermchai Kositpipat and represent years of meticulous craft. Afterward, you will marvel at the gargantuan statue of Guan Yin, which is an admired Buddhist Goddess of Deity, at the Huai Pla Kung Temple. You can view Chiang Rai through the eyes of this enormous statue, which stands 25 stories high and deftly blends ancient Thai and Chinese architecture. You will transfer back to Chiang Mai later this afternoon once you have enjoyed an authentic taste of Northern Thai cuisine on a behind-the-scenes, street food tour.

dayInfo.title: Sukhothai – A Past Preserved with Pleasure
dayInfo.description: Sukhothai is a treasure trove of heritage highlights that you will enjoy discovering throughout your secluded stay. Here, you will escape to your impeccable accommodation in the heart of the age-old town, where you will have the morning to unwind around the pool and tuck into delectable meals at the resort’s premier restaurant. Sukhothai’s most notable attraction is its Historical Park, which gushes with century-old palaces that are venerated for their indelible legacies. At midday, you will transfer with your experienced guide to the ancient kingdom’s preserved temple ruins, where you will be amazed by their powerful presence. You can even stroll the sculpture-lined pathways and let history reveal itself in the form of moss-covered Buddhist images, dilapidated stone pillars, and Sukhothai-style architecture in varying degrees of restoration. The age-old site serves as an oasis of serenity, and its historical prominence has since been unearthed from the inscribed steles that were collected years ago.

dayInfo.title: Sukhothai – Reveal Ancient Rarities
dayInfo.description: There is a collection of additional temples and museums that are situated in and around the city limits, which showcase the ancient spiritual traditions and store sacred texts. You will transfer to these cultural landmarks today and discover more about the region’s incredibly well-preserved past.
