The Ramkhamhaeng National Museum displays many mesmerizing artifacts, while Wat Saphan Hin Temple features a 300-meter step way where it is said that King Ramkamhaeng would climb up on full moons to honor Buddha. Steeped in mystery and folklore, these heritage sites will share a great deal of insight into the country’s veiled ancestry that many travelers are yet to uncover. The evening will bring you to a vibrant night market where the road lights up in color and the streets ooze spirited energy. Performers will exhibit traditional dance as they are adorned in vivid clothing, while food stalls will burst with tantalizing wafts, rarely giving you an opportunity to rest as you peruse the buzzing market’s aisles. A taste of Thailand’s Northern specialties will conclude your evening in glorious fashion and bring your stay in Sukhothai to a satisfying end.

dayInfo.title: Pattaya – A Taste of Terrific Thai Wine
dayInfo.description: Though Thailand is not globally known for its wine production, there are a few destinations that sport a fine selection of wines, which have been matured by stellar estates with bewitching scenic backdrops. One such estate is situated in Pattaya, which is the final destination of your cultural tour across the country. You will transfer to the gorgeous green lands that surround this dignified wine estate shortly after you have checked into your dreamy seaside resort. The production of these vineyard’s quality harvests is aided by the use of exceptional imported-machinery that comes from Italy. You will revel in the opportunity to taste some of the country’s finest blends and vintages as they are paired with remarkable dishes for a completely riveting wine tasting experience. You can end your splendid day in the countryside alongside the picturesque vineyard setting before you make your way back to your resort and spend the evening at your leisure.

dayInfo.title: Pattaya – Farewell to Paradise
dayInfo.description: You will spend your final day at your own pace as you enjoy a delicious breakfast spread before venturing to the beach for a morning of soaking up the sun or to the city’s elite shopping district for retail therapy. You may even invigorate your minds and bodies at your resort’s prestigious wellness center as you will be spoiled for choice with a number of expertly performed spa treatments. Your final day in Pattaya will present the best in opulent travel before you collect your belongings and make your way to Bangkok’s airport with a wealth of unforgettable memories to return home.

tourName: Hidden Islands of Thailand Tour: 14 Days Off the Beaten Path
placesVisited: Phuket, Koh Racha Yai, Koh Jum, Ko Mook, Trang, Koh Tao, Koh Samui, Similan Islands
generalInfo: On this exclusive 2-week island-hopping journey, you will travel to exquisite resorts located on castaway shores and cherish the impeccable spotlights of natural wonder and culture that abound from this island paradise. Thailand’s islands are adored for their powdery sands, crystalline seas, and limestone cliffs. Among the garden of coveted, tropical destinations are a collection of rarely visited isles that make for a fabulous off-the-beaten-path escape.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Cruise on a Royal Ship
dayInfo.description: Upon your arrival, Phuket’s beaches will reveal their beauty, and after you have been provided with time to check-in to your accommodation, you will be transferred to Freedom Beach. Freedom Beach does not often have many visitors, so you should have most of the beach to yourself to relax under the palm trees. On day two, you will rise to the sweltering Thai sun, which will glisten through the tiny gaps in your blinds and invite you on an adventure. Today, you will transfer to a nearby pier, where you will board a Thai junk boat and transfer to Phang Nga Bay. Your exemplary tour of Phang Nga Bay will conclude with a visit of Wat Suwan Khuha, which is a temple within a majestic cave that features dimly-lit chambers and a golden statue of Buddha.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Tour the Similan Islands
dayInfo.description: Although Phuket is a popular island destination in Thailand, during this island-hopping adventure, you will experience activities far from the tourist crowds and will have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the country’s engrossing energy. The incredible archipelago, which you will transfer to this morning, is dreamlike, and the spectacles of the sea and limestone islands will unfold before your eyes as you approach the isles. You may spend your moments on the islands any way you please and will be spoiled for choice with options. During your time here, you can indulge in a hike to any of these summits, which will provide you with surreal views.

dayInfo.title: Koh Racha Yai – Snorkel in Coral Reefs
dayInfo.description: Today, a privately captained speedboat will charter you to the acclaimed accommodation on Koh Racha Yai, and you will be absorbed by the sights of the island-dotted seascape. At the resort, you can find a cozy spot to set up your picnic blankets beneath green palm trees. A vibrant marine ecosystem lives beneath the water among the colorful network of coral systems, and you may be delighted to discover it with high-quality snorkeling gear. After a snorkeling experience, you will be able to indulge in an evening yoga session led by experienced instructors.

dayInfo.title: Koh Racha Yai – The Island’s Fishing Culture
dayInfo.description: Koh Racha Yai is steeped in Thailand’s long-established fishing culture, and its reefs and sandbars are home to a collection of government-licensed catches. You can customize your trip to include a half-day fishing tour accompanied by expert Thai fishermen, which will allow you to cast your lines at the island’s iconic fishing destinations. Afterward, your knowledgeable guide will meet you outside your resort with an ATV for each of you, and you will be led on a riveting expedition through the jungle-clad destination on ATVs. Every so often, your guide will slow down to a rest point, where monkeys hang from branches and vivid birds sing at the top of their lungs.

dayInfo.title: Koh Racha Yai – Scuba Dive with Marine Life
dayInfo.description: Today, you will partake in a scuba diving course after breakfast. You do not need to worry if you have no prior diving experience because your course will be led by talented instructors who will guide you through the entire process. When you are ready, you will venture to coveted diving destinations around Koh Racha Yai from the comfort of a yacht. There will be so many creatures to amaze you during your dive, and you will be thrilled to capture these sightings with a professional underwater camera. For dinner, your resort can prepare a private table for you on the beach.

dayInfo.title: Koh Jum – Attune to the Island Lifestyle
dayInfo.description: This morning, you will be whisked to Koh Jum in a private speedboat. The journey, though relatively quick, will share incredible views of the famed Phi Phi Islands. You will soon arrive at your exalted resort, which will set an incredibly high standard of sustainable luxury and is nestled in tropical gardens that overlook a private beach. The island is fringed by mangrove forests of trees and flowers that you will explore by kayak once you have settled into your suite. After your kayaking adventure, you will be led on an exclusive tour of the island that will allow you to further discover its unique ecosystems and wildlife.

dayInfo.title: Koh Jum – Speedboat Tour of Secluded Shores
dayInfo.description: After breakfast, you will venture to the beach, where a knowledgeable guide will welcome you aboard a charter for you to cruise to Koh Jum’s neighboring islands. Railay, Poda, and Chicken Island will be featured on your list of destinations for the day, and each will reveal the tropical allure of Thailand’s islands in a distinctive manner. Your tour will then continue to Ko Poda, which is a dreamlike island with luminescent coral reefs. You will also be able to indulge in a Thai BBQ spread, which will be prepared in front of you on the beach. Lastly, for the day, you will visit Chicken Island and witness the bizarre rock formation on which its name is derived.

dayInfo.title: Ko Mook – Premier Thai Spa Therapy
dayInfo.description: Ko Mook will be the ideal island escape for the next two nights of your tour. You will have a day to unwind and will likely need it following your adventurous experiences thus far. Whether you wish to lounge on the shaded shores or bask in the calming waters, you will feel entirely content in the solitude environment on which your resort lies. Before you indulge in a tantalizing meal and call it a day, you may enjoy a vigorous spa therapy performed by professional masseuses who are trained in ancient Thai massage practices.

dayInfo.title: Ko Mook – Hat Chao Mai National Park
dayInfo.description: Today, you will travel to Trang, where you will immerse yourself in the seaside district’s surreal scenes before tracing the culture and history of your destination. Your tour will be led by an experienced guide and will begin at the Phraya Ratsadanupradit Mahitsaraphakdi Museum. Your educational and inspiring tour will continue to the charming streets of Ban Na Meun Sri, which is a humble village where countless women practice the craft of weaving silk. Afterward, you will transfer to the dense forest of Trang Peninsular Botanic Garden and cross its suspended bridge to explore the diverse wildlife, flowers, and indigenous plants that exist across the immense stretch of greenery.

dayInfo.title: Koh Tao – Slow-Paced Living
dayInfo.description: When you are ready this morning, you will take to the skies in a private jet for a journey that will be as efficient as it is luxurious. During your time in the jet, you will enjoy the pleasure of skipping baggage checks and tourist queues and will trade these shortcomings for astounding vistas of the illustrious landscapes. You will soon step onto the shimmering sands of the island after a short speedboat trip from Koh Samui Airport. Once you settle into your luxurious accommodation, you will be provided with a gourmet dinner by one of the island’s premier chefs. Once you have finished your meal, you will witness a traditional fire spinning performance.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Architecture and Beaches
dayInfo.description: You will transfer to Koh Samui, which is Koh Tao’s more popular neighboring island, for the final leg of your bewitching expedition to Thailand’s off-the-beaten-path locales. Upon your arrival, you will step onto the soft sand and be welcomed to your luxury resort. A knowledgeable guide will transfer you to a charming fishing village, which boasts a collection of opulent restaurants and cafes while retaining much of its old-world charm. As your luxurious retreat to the famed islands draws to a close, you will have one last morning to make the most of before you soar into the sky toward your home.

tourName: Highlights of Thailand Tour: Bangkok, Ayutthaya, Kanchanaburi, Phuket & Koh Phi Phi
placesVisited: Bangkok, Ayutthaya, Kanchanaburi, Phuket, Koh Phi Phi
generalInfo: Jade statues shimmer in the bright lights, golden temples offer lustrous history, and immaculate beaches glow three shades of blue. Witness ornate boats ridden by kings on this custom tailored tour in and around Bangkok and Phuket. From the Chao Phraya River to the famed Buddha within the tree, the Big Buddha overlooking the ocean to the remarkable school of fish swimming beneath the sea, explore the luxurious diversity of Thailand set within its history, along its cityscape, and beside its shores.

dayInfo.title: Explorer’s Arrival
dayInfo.description: Arrive in the capital of Thailand, Bangkok, where the cityscape reaches both upward and outward, creating the country’s largest metropolis. The charm of the city is hidden beneath the shade of trees and around the gilded spires of temples that continue to grace the city in the best of ways. The bustle of the city is part of its elegance. The speed works with the people, almost as if every person has a part to play, knowing where they are supposed to be at any moment, giving a sense of choreography to the mayhem. The streets are filled with the scent of fresh noodles and decadent fried chicken, where sweet, sour, and spicy come together for an unforgettable combination. Your time in the grandeur of Bangkok has just begun, but you can already see its splendor underneath the banyan trees, within the smiles of shop owners, and definitely within the alluring aromas of the unparalleled cuisine.

dayInfo.title: When Palaces and Temples Combine
dayInfo.description: Set along the waterway of the Chao Phraya River, the Grand Palace is a spectacle to experience. Where once the river was the main source of transport, the palace has an opulent posture set against the lapping water on the riverbanks. Built in the latter half of the 18th century, the palace continues to be a symbol of the king, though it is now used largely for ceremonial purposes. Within the palace complex are sensational temples that house some of the most well-preserved and coveted Buddhist artifacts, including Wat Phra Kaew, the Temple of the Emerald Buddha. The structure is raised on a series of platforms, giving height and grandeur to the golden building. The balcony walls are decorated with sensational murals telling the story of the Ramayana, epic in its entirety. The statues that guard the temple are over 15 feet tall, each an ornately carved and. The spicy aroma of incense surrounds the interior. The Buddha is spotlighted, giving him green glow beneath golden robes. His cloaks are changed seasonally by the king in a ritual that brings good fortune to Thailand. There is peacefulness within the temple, filled with the quiet of visitors and the awe of pilgrims that makes a visit worthwhile.

dayInfo.title: Tree Roots and Temples
dayInfo.description: After breakfast you will venture outside of the metropolis to the fabulous city of Ayutthaya, the once storied capital of Siam. The history of the city spans over four-centuries, all writ in the remains of the fabulous temples that continue to tower over bits of the city and the jungle commanding respect and reverence amongst all visitors. Wat Mahathat is over 600 years old and was once the home to the Supreme Patriarch leader of the Thai Buddhist monks. The manicured grass gives a manufactured structure to the sandstone, where the colors of the ruins shift from white to deep brown stone and back again. The Temple of the Great Relics, as it is called in English, continues to inspire with the elegance of its remains. A Buddha sculpture proudly sits on a platform, legs crossed, and hands placed by his knees. A large swath of yellow cloth is draped across his body as he is forever poised in the moment of enlightenment. A large tree has its roots dangling and tangling out of the ground; it looks as though the tree’s trunk is made of a collection of vines. Look deeper within the tangle and you can see the famed Buddha Head hidden within the niches of the tree. No one is certain how the head became wrapped up in the vines but, as Buddha’s slight smile peers at you from within the dangling roots, there is an ease to the moment, where the sun dimmer, the shade feels cooler, and the world offers you a moment to take a deep breath. You will return to Bangkok in the late afternoon with the calm and wonder of Ayutthaya echoing in your thoughts.

dayInfo.title: Explore Kanchanaburi and Famous Bridge of River Kwai
dayInfo.description: The early morning brings with it the lusciousness of creamy coconut and fresh squeezed orange juice. After breakfast you will once again venture outside of Bangkok to the riverside town of Kanchanaburi, known as the filming location for the movie, The Bridge on the River Kwai . The bridge was built by prisoners of war during World War II, overseen by the Japanese, and meant to stretch 250 miles from Ban Pong, Thailand to Thanbyuzayat, Burma. The Thailand-Burma Railway Museum is an interactive museum filled with photos and first hand accounts from actual POWs during the war. The interior of the museum is immaculate, with black and white photos documenting the tracks, the officers in charge, and the conditions of the camp. Follow your guide out of the museum and onto a stretch of tracks that hug the mountainside. The air is warm and scented with granite and steel. You can walk along a short stretch of the railway, where the tracks are clear, and the experience of walking through the modern history sends tingles down your spine. Back in town you will be able to step onto the actual bridge depicted in the movie, overlooking the Mekong River, where the gentle trickle of the water settles the history.

dayInfo.title: City Bustle to Island Splendor
dayInfo.description: Today you will venture away from the metropolis of Bangkok and transfer to the stunning island of Phuket. Off of the western shores of the mainland are the sensationally clear waters of Phuket, where history adds elegance to the island paradise. Old Phuket Town stands like a beacon of a colonial past where cultures and beauty decorate the shores, from Portuguese mansions to Chinese tradition. There is an essence of classic architecture beneath the rise of palm trees and within the calm rush of waves on the immaculate beach. No matter where you are on Phuket you are never far from majesty, whether next to the cool, clear ocean, within the hills by the Big Buddha, or strolling through Old Town between the tailors and candy shops, art galleries and Chinese noodle shops.

dayInfo.title: Island Allure
dayInfo.description: The grandeur of the island is yours to explore today at your whim and pleasure. The morning sun bounces off of the water with the glint of crystal. For a fantastic view of the entire island you can visit Big Buddha in Chalong, whose white frame towers over Phuket on the island’s highest summit. The large image rises over Nakkerd Hill, standing over 135 feet tall, and is considered a welcome sign for those out to sea. The sweeping vistas of Phuket offer an overwhelming panorama of Phuket Town, where the Portuguese mansions shine beneath the trees, the ocean waves are vibrant and lively throughout the island, and the distinctive reach of jungle mixes with the sapphire horizon. In the afternoon you can venture to Wat Chalong, where Poh Than Jao Wat, one of the most important Buddhist statues in Phuket, is housed. In the most westerly hall of the temple you can find two statues of old men, representations of an old local who continued to win lotteries after being blessed by the Poh Than Jao Wat statue. The Grand Pagoda dominates the temple, decorated with wall paintings that depict the Buddha’s life story. The air is breezy and cool and the temple is famed for housing a splinter of Buddha’s bone. There is an ease and softness to the temple giving you a pleasant urge to continue to the water and watch the quiet reaches of the sunset.

dayInfo.title: Famed Waters and Illustrious Landscapes
dayInfo.description: Today you will embark on a journey away from the luster of Phuket that will take you to the diverse and alluring waters of the Phi Phi Islands. Climb aboard a speedboat to begin your exceptional day where six islands comprise the archipelago only 45 minutes away. The wind whips through your hair as the mist sprays against your cheeks. The water is three shades of blue, ranging from nearly clear to sapphire, sitting beneath the rising green of the jungle island. With many shores to visit, you first step along the sands of Monkey Beach where the primates hide within the trees and lurk within the branches. Over the years they have become less shy and coarser, scouring for food within the visitors. The long-tailed macaque monkeys are dark gray with faces like sour men, and they reach for bananas or chocolate, taking their treasures and jumping nimbly onto the rocks, scared of the surf. Along the shores of Koh Phi Phi Leh you can see the familiar beach that was home to Leonardo Dicaprio in the film The Beach . Enter into Maya Bay where the limestone karsts are bright and majestic, capturing your imagination and making you wonder if you may be dreaming. The natural beauty is unparalleled, from the clear water that allows you to see to the ocean floor to the rising precipices that are capped with stellar greenery, and powdery white sands that make the beach nothing but inviting. The beach faces the entrance of the bay where you can dive into the water and watch the colorful fish swim in huddled schools. The vibrant hues beneath the sea rival the effervescence above the surface. Eventually you will carry on to the outlying shores of other islands before returning to Bangkok, but within the pristine waters of Maya Bay, with the karsts above and wondrous life below, you know that the moment is perfect.

dayInfo.title: Feeling at Home
dayInfo.description: The opulent beauty of the island continues to glisten in the morning sun giving you one last look at the magnificent beauty of Phuket and Thailand before arriving at the airport. Your flight will have you home in almost no time, filled with the majestic memories of your time within the fabulous cities and grand waters of Southeast Asia. Home is filled with comfort and familiarity, but you have trouble remembering a time before Thailand that has ever been more luxurious. You may want to read the Thailand tours reviews for ideas on how to further customize this trip.

tourName: Immersive 10-Day Tour of Thailand
placesVisited: Bangkok, Ayutthaya, Sukhothai, Chiang Mai, Chiang Rai
generalInfo: White temples shimmer along dusty lanes while ancient capitals lay in an evocative state of ruin, clearly from another time. Local Siam life unfolds around the river and monks will greet you serenely at sunrise. Welcome to Siam, an old kingdom of legend with a legacy that lives on today. Spend ten days experiencing the grand highlights as you travel north from Bangkok as you begin, and end in Chiang Rai. There will be dancing, hot air ballooning, elephants, chedi, traditions, Lanna temples and so much more.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Dancing and Indulgent Dining on the Chao Phraya
dayInfo.description: Touching down in Bangkok can bring some culture shock. Bangkok is a sprawling, bustling city, where the old meets the new with a strange congruence. It does not feel very relaxed at first, even with an airport meet and greet and luxury transfer into the city. But check in to your five-star hotel along the river, and Bangkok slowly reveals its charms. There will be all of the contemporary comforts you could ask for as Thailand’s capital is far more developed than most people assume. You will enjoy the serenity of the river with its banks dotted with temples and colorful boats. You will dine at Bangkok’s most exclusive venue, watching a Thai dance performance on the banks of the Chao Phraya. When returning to the hotel, you will already have one foot in old Siam.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Spiritual Siam and an Afternoon on the River
dayInfo.description: Bangkok’s famous highlights are best explored in the morning when it is cooler, and there are fewer people around. Chanting and incense fill the rooms at Wat Po with corridors that lead you towards an enormous Buddha statue. Hallways and reception rooms dazzle with gold at the Royal Palace, the richness of its wonders akin to anything you would find in Europe. The sight of the Emerald Buddha is around the corner, and while the Buddha is small, the emotional atmosphere among the Thai pilgrims is very moving here. Visit these three highlights, and you will not need to do more as Bangkok’s other historical attractions are easily outshone by what is yet to come on this 10-day Thailand tour. Head out to see a more local side to the city this afternoon. All of the bustle and the color is much easier to appreciate when you are cruising on the Chao Phraya. Bells ring at riverside temples as wooden shop fronts sell a little of everything and a lot of fruit. A low-slung cityscape gives way to quiet canals and buffalo-studded fields. Cruising further away from Bangkok, you can visit the famous puppeteers of Baan Silapan, admiring deft movements and famous Siam tales. Then as you return to central Bangkok the city lights are turning on, an illuminated Temple of Dawn just one potential place to stop before reaching your hotel.

dayInfo.title: Ayutthaya – Stepping Further Back Into Siam’s Past
dayInfo.description: An enchanting world of temples and ruins, Ayutthaya still revels in its splendor. For over 400 years it was the Siam capital, and you will be quickly immersed due to its scale and its detail. Extravagant temples rise skyward with their intricate details demanding closer inspection. Chedi are cracked, and there are so many as hundreds upon hundreds cast across the dusty ground. You will explore in a special tuk tuk, crossing the UNESCO World Heritage Site through the ruins and temples to the candy floss aromas of the Muslim quarter. Life continues along the edges of the historical park, and you can visit two local houses, as well as try culinary specialties from the market. Ayutthaya needs 24 hours, though most people visit on a rushed day-trip from Bangkok. After half a day in the ruins, you can switch from a tuk tuk to a long-tail boat. The cruise will take you to Bang Pa-In Summer Palace, where royal mansions stretch out from a quiet garden. Wat Niwet Thammaprawat is nearby, an architectural mix of old Buddhist Siam and Gothic European, with stained glass windows that send shards of light onto Buddha in repose. By spending the night, there is also a feeling of tranquility to follow all of that exploration, found along the river at dusk as chedi and temples turn to silhouette against a setting sun.

dayInfo.title: Sukhothai – A Dreamy Journey to the Dawn of Happiness
dayInfo.description: It will be a lovely train journey north this morning with a chance to watch rural Thailand roll by as you take stock of how much you have experienced in just three days. Tiny wooden villages dot the hills, and when disembarking in Phitsanulok, you can join hundreds of local pilgrims as they seek good fortune at Siam’s most legendary Buddha image. Again, while the actual Buddha is not hugely impressive, you will always remember the emotionally-charged atmosphere. By late afternoon, you will be in Sukhothai, where first impressions reflect the etymology of its name as Sukhothai translates as “Dawn of Happiness.”

dayInfo.title: Sukhothai – The Fairytale World of the First Capital
dayInfo.description: Lost relics slowly rise from the shadows as some chedi are whitewashed and gleam proudly beneath the sun, restored to their former glory. Others are cracked or laying in pieces, suggestive of their 13th-century origins. There are almost 200 in total, and your photographs will be very impressive, especially in the light of the morning. Mosaic patterns are faded, yet impressive, on the temple walls. Some temples have been expertly restored, Wat Sri Chum showcasing the grandeur of the kingdom’s first capital, with Buddhas sitting serenely in structures of moss-scorched rock. After lunch, there will be time to rest before you continue the historical experience, wandering through columns to Wat Mahathat and its 200 subordinate stupas. Find a dreamy place for sunset and finish the day with a real understanding of what it must have been like to be here 800 years ago.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – A Lanna Temple to a Hilltop Experience
dayInfo.description: A change in architectural style will appear as you stop in Lampang at a 15th-century Lanna temple that the local community has expertly maintained. Rich details line the facade, with mosaic stories sculpted into rock. Once inside, it is simple and spiritual with aromas of incense casting Buddha images into a slight haze. This Wat Phra That Lampang Luang temple is an easy stop on the 3 ½ hour journey north to Chiang Mai, where you will check into a spa retreat just outside the city. After a few days on the road, it will be time to indulge. But not before watching the sunset from Chiang Mai’s famous hilltop temple, a cacophony of ringing bells marking the transition from day to night.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Ballooning Over Chiang Mai and Exploring the Villages of Mae Taeng
dayInfo.description: Chiang Mai is Siam’s cultural heart. Until the 1920s it was cut off from the world, hidden in a forest that was only accessible on elephant back or a tortuous upriver journey. The city walls still stand, protected by a moss-filled moat as red-brick temples meet whitewashed pagodas and locals ring their bicycle bells. Life is slow and serene here, illustrated by the lines of monks you always see on the streets. Ballooning over Chiang Mai provides an excellent understanding of the city’s location, and you can cruise above the mountainous forest with nothing but nature beyond the city boundaries. As you drift, there will be more. Beneath your feet, there are temples, their abundance almost baffling when seen from the air. This slow mode of sunrise travel leads into a leisurely day spent around the spa, and then at some small villages in Mae Taeng. Traditions live on in this region, and a community host will guide you through basket weaving, farming, cooking, and music. Although these villages have turned to tourism in recent years, they remain a hospitable and accessible way to explore old Siam culture. Plus you can easily take a hike through the nearby rice paddies, past buffalos plowing fields to small waterfalls.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Morning With the Monks; Elephants and Adventure in Doi Suthep National Park
dayInfo.description: Monks wander barefoot down the Chiang Mai streets, chanting softly as they go. Their robes seem to glow in the morning light, radiant beneath chedi and temple tops. They are asking for alms, an evocative morning scene of local people supporting the city’s monks. It will be worth the early alarm call, and you will have the rest of the morning to lie down again, perhaps with another spa retreat or just around the pool. This afternoon will bring another evocative scene as elephants wander the forests of Doi Suthep as gibbons swing through the trees. Rather than ride the elephants, you will walk with them in the forest and connect with giants while searching for primates.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Rai – The Dazzling White Temple and a Local Place to Finish
dayInfo.description: Superman is painted onto the outside of Wat Rong Khun, the White Temple. There is a Nemo and a Coca-Cola can as well alongside all manner of figures and icons from the contemporary world. Head inside, and the artistic style continues as an allegory of past and future, good and bad, spiritualism and commercialism. The temple itself is more like a palace, shimmering an intense white hue. Serpents and tridents are carved into this stone, marking a bridge you must cross to reach fictional superheroes. This temple is more an art gallery than a place of worship, and is completely unlike any other in Southeast Asia, something that has attracted plaudits and critics in equal measure. Stop at the White Temple on your two-hour drive north to Chiang Rai, a small and authentic border city that is ideal for your final day in Thailand. Like Chiang Mai and Bangkok, Chiang Rai has night markets, temples, tuk tuks, colorful storefronts, and the country’s exotic allure, but it is not yet too popular. There are not many other travelers at the night market, and you can get a sense of how Thailand used to be, before its popularity. Chiang Rai has now been connected to the country with a domestic airport, making it an even more appealing proposition.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Departure
dayInfo.description: Spend your morning relaxing before you are transferred to the domestic airport terminal to fly back to Bangkok, and then onwards to home.

tourName: Immersive Family Vacation to Thailand: Phuket to Bangkok
placesVisited: Phuket, Koh Phi Phi, Koh Lanta, Krabi, Bangkok
generalInfo: Thailand’s global appeal stems largely from the riveting attractions that the remarkable country shares with its visitors. From first-class, palm-tree lined tropical islands to culturally rich city centers, it offers rarely rivaled travel settings and a myriad of fun-filled activities. During this engaging, 3-week holiday, you and your family will visit the country’s most beloved destinations and bask in the top-tier attractions. You will find yourselves marveling at the vibrant sea life while snorkeling great reefs, traversing crystal-clear waters by kayak, and mastering the art of Thai cuisine. Bring your whole family to this unforgettable journey that you will never want to end.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – A Thriving Tropical Paradise
dayInfo.description: Phuket will welcome you and your family to Thailand with a warm, sunny embrace. You will meet your private transfer shortly after checking through immigration. Then, you will settle into a luxuriously comfortable vehicle and journey to your 5-star accommodation that will be located near the popular Rawai Beach. The charming hotel will be the perfect fit for your family as it caters to groups of all ages. It offers lavish experiences for you and your partner while incorporating child-focused activities to cater to very young ones. Your stay will be exemplary, spending each evening in peaceful serenity as you rest your heads on comfortable beds only a few steps from the beach. Shortly after unpacking your things, you will set off on a comfortable drive around the area. You will encounter many of the aspects that make this island so special. There are colorful stalls that line the streets, selling bundles of enticing trinkets. Local Wats that are dotted around the island will advertise their humble majesty. The busy vendors’ woks will emanate tantalizing wafts of delicious, traditional dishes. Soon, you will arrive at a classy restaurant that overlooks the charming Nai Harn Beach. You will enjoy your first evening, like many of them to follow, with immaculate sunset vistas over the sea as you dine on incredibly curated, gourmet Thai cuisine. You will explore more of Phuket’s premier beaches the following day. With the help of your knowledgeable tour guide, you will transfer to the most coveted sandy paradises on the island. Here, you and your family will have the opportunity to snorkel to your heart's content. As you dive down into the crystal clear waters, you will encounter brightly colored sea life. Up close encounters with Thailand’s vibrant coral reefs can life-changing experiences, so be sure to bring along an underwater camera to capture the glorious moments. You and your children will bask in the thrilling activities on the island over the course of the following few days. An engaging trick eye museum will transport your family into a world of art, and Phuket Fantasea’s theatrical performances will highlight the country’s magical cultural heritage. A sought-after waterpark offers endless splashing fun as well. These are only a few of the exciting experiences that you can expect to indulge in during your stay. Your tour of Phuket will culminate with an immersive culinary class where you will uncover the secrets behind authentic Thai dishes and hone your cooking skills in a carefree and fun atmosphere. You will check-out of your hotel on your final day and board a luxury speed boat that is bound for Koh Phi Phi.

dayInfo.title: Koh Phi Phi – Snorkeling the Entire Island
dayInfo.description: Following a short speed boat trip, you will arrive on the famous Phi Phi Island. As you make your way to the pier, you will wrap around the rugged mountain and enter the picturesque bay. A warm breeze will lift off the ocean and welcome you to the tropical paradise. From your lavish boat, you will witness the palm tree-lined beaches that hug the coastline. It will truly be a sight to behold, and it is one that images rarely do justice. You will soon arrive in Loh Ba Kao Bay, which is some distance from the hustle and bustle of the Phi Phi backpackers’ hub. This makes it an exceptionally suitable place for you and your family to spend your stay. The immaculate bay boasts an idyllic beach and your, luxurious accommodation sits on its edge. From your private bungalow, you will have uninterrupted views of the ocean, and an evening of fine dining at the hotel’s gourmet restaurant will reveal the wondrous flavors of freshly caught Thai seafood dishes. In the morning of your first full day on the island, you will meet your private tour guide after a sumptuous breakfast. Then, set you will off via speed boat to the most sought-after Phi Phi attractions. You and your family will journey to premier beaches for a day of relaxing fun. Your insightful guide will share intriguing information about the island all throughout the tour, and then they will transfer you to the most revered snorkeling destinations around the landscape. Here, you will get off the boat and witness unforgettable coral views. The vibrant reefs are home to an array of sea species, and there will be no shortages of thrills on these underwater expeditions. The following day, you will further capture the riveting snorkeling moments at the much-loved Bamboo Island. A few hours on Bamboo Beach will provide a lifetime of precious memories. Once back on Phi Phi Island, you and your family will traverse the waters in stable and comfortable kayaks. You will see the island from a completely fresh perspective as you gently glide across the turquoise water. Your stay in Phi Phi will be complete with a visit to the notable Viking Cave where you will discover ancient cave paintings and the history of the destination with the help of your engaging tour guide. Finally, you will round off your Phi Phi tour with a brisk hike to the viewpoint. With a cozy restaurant to welcome you with refreshing beverages, you will arrive in good shape roughly 30 minutes after beginning the trek. At the top of the tall mountain, you will encounter sweeping vistas of the entire island. The striking ‘H’ shaped island shows off its jungle beauty from these great heights. A marvelous sunset will drop down below the opposite end of the island and light up the sky with a fiery orange hue. You and your family will revel in the unspoiled views, and the following day, after a fulfilling breakfast, you will board a well-kept speed boat and head for Koh Lanta.

dayInfo.title: Koh Lanta – Brave the Emerald Cave
dayInfo.description: The exotic island of Koh Lanta awaits your arrival on the 10th day of your family adventure. The Koh Lanta region, in the province of Krabi, comprises of many islands, but you will be enjoying your trip in the comfort of a desirable 5-star resort on the southern tip of the main island. Koh Lanta is an exclusive destination, and your stay will be nothing less than that. You and your family will arrive at the foremost hotel eager-eyed and bushy-tailed. Your luxurious rooms look out over the stunning seaside setting. Your day will come to a splendid conclusion with an award-winning dinner prepared by a revered local chef. The following day, you will spend exploring the serene beaches of Koh Lanta. Your private transfer and guide will take you to leading destinations along the sprawling strip of coastline. Here, you will revel in the immaculate views and peaceful beach activities. With the soft, white sand beneath your feet and a crystal-clear ocean inviting you for a swim, you will feel completely content under the tropical sun. In the afternoon, you will visit the Mu Koh Lanta National Park and traverse the rugged hills to the famous lighthouse, and you will capture the greater Koh Lanta landscape in all its glory. You will finish the day with a delicious sunset meal over the sea with spectacular sights of traditional fire-spinning. Before you leave the luscious island, you will spend a day exploring 4 of the nearby pivotal island destinations. A speed boat will transfer you to the pinnacle highlights near Koh Lanta where you and your family will visit the incredible Emerald Cave on Koh Mook. Hop off the boat and brave the dark, lengthy cave. Your private guide will lead the way, so you do not get lost. You will hear bats fluttering above your heads as you traverse the deep waters. You will reach a hidden lagoon on the other end of the cave that will be complete with a secluded beach in the pits of a circular rock formation. The photo opportunities will be unreal, and the memories will last forever. This immersive ocean tour of Koh Lanta will conclude after a riveting few days on the island.

dayInfo.title: Krabi – An Exclusive Escape
dayInfo.description: You and your family will transfer to the greater Krabi region on the 14th day of your trip. It is a thriving province that is known for its abundance of beautiful islands, jagged limestone mountains, and thick green forests. You will arrive in the popular destination of Railay and check-in to your completely luxurious villa near the beach. Your resort will rest in the peninsula and be surrounded by striking cliffs and immaculate forest gardens. The exotic location will offer uninterrupted vistas of the glassy peninsula waters, and you will revel in an air of tranquility as you unpack in your 5-star suite. You will spend your first day discovering the majestic Railay area. From lazing around on the pristine beach to venturing into jagged caves, the family-friendly activities will be endless. You will journey to viewpoints for indescribable sights. If your children are older, then you may take part in incredibly safe but captivating rock-climbing tours. A riveting kayak meander along the gentle ocean nearby your hotel will share the perfect secluded escape from the shores. During your stay in Krabi, you will privately transfer to a cultural tour of Wat Tham Sua , also known as the Tiger Cave. Climbing to the marvelous sacred temple, set amid a rugged cave complex, will yield a mesmerizing experience that will be topped off with 360-degree views. The enchanting Buddhist statues stand beautifully tall at peaks of the Wat . After a thoroughly insightful and cultural exploration, you will transfer to Krabi Town and indulge in authentic hospitality and culture. Here, you will taste the delectable flavors of traditional Thai cuisine. Your stay in Krabi will culminate with a day of cooking and pampering. You and your family will visit a prestigious culinary school and learn the art of a few new Thai dishes. The masterful chef will walk you through the entire process, helping everyone grasp the essentials efficiently. Following this tasteful experience, you will visit a premier spa for a traditional Thai massage. The awakening experience will round off your leisurely cultural stay in Krabi.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A City Bursting with Energy
dayInfo.description: Before heading for home, there is one last essential destination for you to visit. Moving away from the tropical Thailand paradises, you will transfer to the bustling city of Bangkok. The capital city of Thailand is famous for its deep cultural roots, exquisite cuisine, and exciting activities. Here, staying in an exuberant hotel along the Chao Phraya River, you will bask in complete luxury over your final few days. The city perfectly captures ancient Thai tradition and blends it with modern sophistication. The incredible fusion is represented in the juxtaposition of the towering skyscrapers and busy, colorful streets. You and your family will enjoy an immersive exploration of Bangkok’s coveted temples and leading cultural landmarks via a traditional Tuk-Tuk . As you journey to the beautiful, spiritual sites, you will feel the wind blowing through your hair from the open-air vehicle. You will zip through the streets and arrive at captivating destinations such as the Jim Thompson House and the Grand Palace, and you will uncover Thai culture with compelling trips to authentic markets. Here, you will find an array of appealing gems to purchase for you and your family. Then, unwind in style with a multiple-course, gourmet meal as you cruise by luxurious boat along the Chao Phraya River. You will spend time in Bangkok discovering the special activities that highlight the city’s innovation. Enjoy sumptuous food as your children get to play with well-looked after creatures at one of the most exclusive animal cafes. You will all delight in luxury shopping at the premier Siam Square retail district. Furthermore, you will visit Bangkok’s leading aquarium and have the chance to witness the incredible displays of thousands of intriguing sea species. The penultimate highlight of your stay in Bangkok will be a final dining experience at the top of a skyscraper. As the sun dips down over the horizon and you tuck into award-winning cuisine, you will be truly ecstatic about the lavish holiday you have had the fortune of experiencing together. You will transfer to the international airport the following day and say your final goodbyes to the Land of Smiles.

tourName: Immersive Getaway Vacation to Thailand for Couples
placesVisited: Bangkok, Chiang Rai, Koh Samui, Phuket, Similan Islands, Koh Yao, Krabi
generalInfo: For honeymooners and loving couples alike, Thailand is a compelling destination with copious romantic adventures to experience. From riveting explorations of the stunning coral reefs to uninterrupted sunset dinners and relaxing adventures off the beaten path, this tailor-made tour leaves nothing for you to desire. For three intimate weeks, you will tour the country’s most endearing destinations. Each captivating discovery will fill you will passion as you share in the unforgettable moments and make lifelong memories with your partner.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A Passionate Spark
dayInfo.description: Bangkok, the capital city of Thailand, boasts incredible experiences that are perfectly suited for couples on their honeymoon or partners wishing to indulge in the finer moments. The bustling cityscape exudes opulence while cultural landmarks retain an element of old-world charm. You will soon find yourselves weaving through the busy streets in a comfortable, luxurious private transfer. You will make your way to an immaculate 5-star hotel that is situated in the heart of the city. Your secluded suite will share panoramic views of the upper-class skyscrapers, gently flowing Chao Phraya River and exuberant surrounding areas. You will feel at home away from home in your endearing accommodation. You will spend your first evening dining under the setting sun from the summit of a towering skyscraper where you will indulge in delectable Thai dishes as you witness sweeping vistas of the fiery-orange sky and brightly lit cityscape. The following day, a cultured guide will privately transfer you to the significant sites that are sprawled across the city where you will encounter the sacred and coveted temples that glimmer gold in the sun. You will visit spirited markets and treat yourselves to traditional delicacies. Your guided tour will culminate with trips to stunning museums and galleries, and each exhibit will uniquely capture the essence of Thai culture and highlight the peoples’ meticulous dedication to their crafts. Your romantic discovery of Bangkok will not end here. The lush green tree line of Bangkok’s Green Lung provides shelter from the beating sun. You and your partner will cruise along the winding trails of this incredible artificial island by bicycle. Breathe in the fresh air as you zip through the beautiful plant paradise. Gourmet lunch in a nearby high-end tree house restaurant will conclude your day of adventurous romance. You will spend the evening fine dining as you float along the Chao Phraya River on a luxurious river boat. Seeing Bangkok, in this intimate setting and from this unique perspective, will fill you two with joyous passion. You will discover the thrilling nature of authentic, floating markets on your final morning in the city. Then, you will prepare to depart for an enriching destination that will be off the beaten path.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Rai – A City of Ethnic Beauty
dayInfo.description: Chiang Rai is a jungle paradise that is adjacent to the popular city of Chiang Mai. With unspoiled forests and picturesque landscapes, this remote location offers a more luxuriously intimate experience than its frequented, neighboring city. You will transfer, via a short plane ride, to this scenic destination. After a comfortable journey, you will arrive at your gorgeous boutique resort that will be set amid the magnificent mountain ranges. Your private balcony will share uninterrupted glimpses of the beautiful green jungle below. Equipped with a gourmet restaurant and rejuvenating spa, you will revel in the resort’s opulent charm. Your days in Chiang Rai will be romantically riveting. You will comfortably transfer to the Namtok Khun Korn Forest Park, which is only a short distance away. As you enter the park, the world behind you will fade, leaving only the untamed wilderness around you. You and your loved one will enjoy a stunning hike through the thick forest in search of a striking waterfall. You will allow the glorious waterfall to refresh your mind and body as you bathe in its powerful stream. You will witness it in all its majesty as you bask in the idyllic setting. You will then explore the culturally rich city later this afternoon where you will marvel at the destination’s charm as you discover significant heritage sites and a vibrant night bazaar. You will visit the iconic Wat Rong Khun during your culturally uplifting stay. The distinct temple, which is commonly known as the White Temple, stands out from the gold-adorned Wats as it is entirely constructed in white. The marvelously unique design symbolizes the purity of Buddha, and it will be a sight to behold, sharing with it stunning photo opportunities. You will then transfer to a local hot spring for a revitalizing dip in the warm waters. Your adventure will be complete with an immersive visit to a local hill tribe. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, you will meet an ethnic tribe and participate in their captivating cultural traditions. Traditional performances and a delicious lunch will conclude the impressive display.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Escape to Paradise Island
dayInfo.description: At this point, you will have adored the magnificent Bangkok city and uncovered the rich and rural culture of Thailand. On your seventh day, you will escape the thriving city destinations in search of a tropical getaway unlike any other. This wanderlust will lead you to the captivating Koh Samui Island. The island is framed by crystal-clear oceans and sprawling stretches of white sand. It is an exotic paradise that offers exclusive experiences tailor-made for loving couples. You will arrive on Koh Samui after a brief plane ride to Surat Thani, which will be followed by a brisk speed boat cruise to the island. The azure skyline and seashell colored shores will welcome you, so you can comfortably make your way to your premier resort on one of the island’s sun-kissed beaches. Here, you will unwind in style as you enjoy in the resort’s endearing environment and first-class amenities. You can spend your first full day exploring the beaches along its diverse coastline via speed boat, and then, the luxury charter will transfer you to revered seaside destinations with immaculate vistas. You will enjoy the rest of the day at your leisure, soaking in the warmly embracing Thai sun. You will tuck into delectable Thai cuisine during your stay. With an abundance of local stalls that serve authentic curries and fine-dining establishments that offer fresh seafood, there will be no shortage of choice. Shack up at an authentic food market for a delightful taste of kôw gang , which is a curried rice dish. In the evenings, you can visit prestigious restaurants for candlelit dinners under the stars. To culminate your Koh Samui splendor, you will experience a Thai spa treatment at a leading wellness resort. The ancient practice-inspired pampering will fill you with energy, taking your trip to new heights of tranquility.

dayInfo.title: Phuket – Many Marvelous Adventures Await
dayInfo.description: The charming Phuket Island cannot be missed during your romantic Thailand tour. It is a compelling destination that perfectly combines island-style living with culturally captivating fun. Your stay will highlight the things that make this country so special. Friendly faces will welcome you as soon as you touch down on the island, and lively vendors will serve refreshing beverages to locals and foreigners that are passing by. The famous Big Buddha stands mightily tall and overlooks the entire stretch of the island. You will soon uncover all of Phuket’s appealing attractions. After checking into your lavish seaside accommodation off Karon Beach, you will transfer to a sunset spot that overlooks the horizon. You will truly treasure these enchanting moments as you sip on sumptuous cocktails and feast on fabulous food at a revered restaurant on the beach. With pristine beaches and the highlight of the island, you will be spoiled for choice of romantic walks up and down the soft shores. You and your partner will transfer to an ethical elephant sanctuary the following day. Underpinned by strong rehabilitation and conservation practices, a day at this luxurious reserve will invigorate your appreciation for the planet. You will get up close to these mighty creatures and have the opportunity to feed and bathe them. This is all set among a wonderful wilderness environment and accompanied by a knowledgeable guide. The following day, you will enrich your cultural admiration for the country with an incredible journey to the Big Buddha statue. This momentous monument resonates a humbling atmosphere and is complete with marvelous vistas of the island. Before you leave the complex, you may receive a blessing from the devote resident monks. Your immersive day will continue with a culinary class at an impressive cooking school where you will learn the secrets behind coveted Thai meals under the guidance of a renowned local chef. In the evening, you will witness the flamboyant performances at a premier Cabaret Show. You and your loved one will be swept away by the magically theatrical display.

dayInfo.title: Similan Islands – An Ocean worth Exploring
dayInfo.description: From Phuket, you will transfer via luxury speed boat to the Similan Archipelago. These exotic islands, which consist of seven in total, are complete with immaculate beaches and exceptional diving sites. The peaceful shores are some of the most romantic in the country, and you will have the opportunity to share idyllic photo opportunities at each of the distinguished beaches. The diving, which is a highly sought-after attraction, is world-class, and you will have the opportunity to experience the ocean’s splendor the day that you arrive. From beginners to the more experienced, the incredible diving opportunities are endless and not to be missed. With the help of talented and knowledgeable guides, you will master your gear in no time, and soon, you will be diving to the ocean depths in search of the surreal sea creatures which call these islands home. You will witness colorful coral reefs teeming with life, schools of hundreds of fish searching for food, and manta rays gliding through the turquoise waters. With a trusty underwater camera in hand, you will capture unforgettable moments in the water with your partner. All the while, you will be guided to picturesque diving spots as not to miss any of the exciting finds. In the evening, you will stay over on the fourth island in a private bungalow. The archipelago does not allow much construction, and thus, there are limited accommodations on the islands. Though you will only be here for one night, it will be spent in style with views of the bay, and the gorgeous jungle setting will be a magnificent environment to wake up to. The lack of human-made development on the island will be an absolute treat, giving you and your partner a secluded experience that feels worlds away.

dayInfo.title: Koh Yao – Romantic Simplicity
dayInfo.description: You will continue your tropical escape at Koh Yao Island on the 15th day of your trip. The Koh Yao island lies just off Phuket in the greater Phang Nga Bay. The bay is stunning and serves as a travel hotspot for romantic adventures. You will arrive in the mostly unspoiled island and transfer to your premier accommodation via traditional Tuk-Tuk , which is an open-air vehicle. The elevated villas will offer scenic views of the sprawling ocean from the comfort of your bed. It will be a quiet retreat away from the hustle and bustle, sharing peaceful moments for utmost intimacy. Though there is little in terms of modern development on the island, you will explore its rich landscape with a comfortable, guided tour. You will encounter the lush mangroves and quaint rice paddies along the way. There is a simplicity to this island that is rarely rivaled. It offers endless charm with the days drifting by slowly and the laid-back living inspiring ultimate relaxation. You will enjoy locally prepared cuisine for an authentic taste of Thailand, and in the evenings, you may set yourselves up at fine-dining seaside establishments for the most incredible natural views and food. During your stay, you will spend much of your time in the water whether it be wading in the pristine resort pool, snorkeling the vibrant reefs off the coast, or kayaking around the greater island. You will capture lifelong memories of the serene settings as you drift away from the busy mainland. If you are feeling brave enough, then there are many rugged cliffs for you two to climb. An expert guide will accompany you to the rigorous routes, helping you feel completely safe throughout the expedition. If you wish to pass on the bold adventure, then revel in the riveting sunset vistas on an immaculate island beach.

dayInfo.title: Krabi – Revitalize Your Minds and Bodies
dayInfo.description: Before heading home, there is one last tropical destination that you and your loved one need to explore. You will transfer from Phuket to the thriving province of Krabi. Offering exclusive experiences on every corner, Krabi will transport you from the laid-back living to a luxuriously exotic and upbeat environment. This will be the perfect place to spend your final few days in Thailand. You will arrive at your incredible resort where you will spend each night in each other’s company. From your private balcony, you will breathe in the fresh ocean air and marvel at your panoramic vistas. On your first evening, you will board a luxury cruise boat and set off out to sea. With elegant cocktails and each other’s intimate company, you will enjoy the gorgeous sunset views by boat. The spectacle will leave you feeling completely fulfilled. The following day, you will transfer to a revitalizing natural hot spring and soak up the warm waters with the wilderness around you. You will enjoy the lazy day at your own pace and truly relish in these picture-perfect moments together. You will transfer on an engaging four island tour around the greater Krabi region. A luxury speed boat will take you to some of the most magnificent sites in the country where you will have the opportunity to snorkel exuberant coral reefs, brave the compelling Emerald Cave, and bath on beautiful beaches. Your final day in Krabi will be spent in style at a leading wellness spa where you can spoil yourselves with one last authentic, Thai spa treatment to culminate your perfect couple’s vacation. In the evening, you will visit a busy night market and discover the intricate keepsakes to purchase and take home with you. Over the course of this romantic getaway, you two will bond over the stunning shared experiences and return with lifelong memories of the immaculate country.

tourName: Luxury Thailand Honeymoon: Private Excursions, Romantic River Cruise, Top Lodges
placesVisited: Bangkok, Koh Tao, Koh Samui
generalInfo: Embrace the tropical paradise and fascinating culture both found throughout your fabulous honeymoon in Thailand. Indulge in the sweet aroma of fresh coconuts, bask in the glistening views of sapphire water against the pristine coastline and relish the hot sand between your toes. Revel in the charm of hidden sculpture gardens and scour the jungle terrain to find enchanting waterfalls. From golden Buddha statues to the emerald hues of the jungle canopy, radiant coral reefs to pink dolphins in the Gulf of Thailand, your custom tailored tour will immerse you both in luxury and romance for an unforgettable honeymoon in Thailand.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Arrive in Bustling and Luxurious Bangkok, Thailand’s Capital
dayInfo.description: Bangkok is a city of majesty and glamour full of bustling shops and decadent cuisine. Temple spires rise out of hidden lanes and add drama to a skyline of luxurious high-rises. Exotic culture and familiar comforts combine along the waters of the Chao Phraya River with traditional long-tail boats that move against the banks that are lined with contemporary cafes. Your flight will land at Suvarnabhumi Airport where your private transfer will greet you both upon arrival. Your hotel will embody the pleasures of Bangkok through a combination of traditional décor and modern luxury as your room overlooks the calm waters of the river. In the evening, the city shimmers with captivating light, which will reflect in the moving waters that shine from your private view. The remainder of the day will be yours to discover the capital of Thailand at your leisure. You will make your way to Asiatique, a mixture of a traditional Thai night market and a fashionable mall that runs along the riverfront. The aromas of ginger, lime, and shallots will drift out of the local restaurants as more than 1,500 boutique shops offer a mixture of Southeast Asian and international styles. Teenagers take photos with an antique tramcar and old anchors once used on the river, and the Ferris wheel glistens with light as it rotates over the walkways to offer a beautiful and colorful welcome to the two of you.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Relish a River Cruise and Visit the City’s Temples
dayInfo.description: The Chao Phraya River once acted as the main artery of the bustling capital city as the king would take to the waterways to reach the palace as fishers traveled between the banks to cast their nets into the water. At breakfast, you and your partner will find the seductive aromas of pineapple, coconut, and mangosteen filling the room as you enjoy every bite. Your guide will greet you in the lobby after your meal and escort you onto a long-tail boat on the river for a private tour of the city’s marvels. The Chao Phraya runs for more than 230 miles before reaching the Gulf of Thailand. The boat brings a romantic atmosphere with it amongst the gentle wake and passing grandeur of the city by day. You will dock at the Grand Palace complex, which was erected in the 18th century and encompasses more than 100 buildings spread across nearly 235 acres. The scent of hibiscus fills the air and accents the gilded halls and lavish architecture that rises along the manicured gardens. It is easy to feel as though you are strolling with your loved one through a gorgeous landscape meant for two before reaching the celebrated temple of Wat Phra Kaew. The edifice represents the spirit of Thai Buddhism, united in the holy image of the Emerald Buddha. The temple was consecrated in the late 18th century after the capital moved from Ayutthaya to Bangkok. 178 murals depict the Ramakian, the Thai version of the Indian epic. Once inside the temple, you will find the scent of incense lingering in the air as the Emerald Buddha sits atop a golden shrine to create a striking figure within the flickering candles and natural light.

dayInfo.title: Koh Tao – Transfer to Koh Tao and Settle into an Island Paradise
dayInfo.description: Outside of Bangkok, the shores of the river burst into life in the morning. The floating market at Thaling Chan fills with long-tail boats stacked with bunches of bananas and handmade garments as soft as silk. Women fry shrimp in large woks on their boats and pass the traditional dish to waiting patrons on the riverbank. At breakfast, the two of you will share in the enticing aroma of freshly brewed coffee accentuated with fresh coconuts. Your private transfer will greet you in the hotel lobby and escort you to the airport for your short flight to Koh Samui. You will continue to your private boat that will connect the fabulous shores of Koh Samui to the paradisiacal coastline of Koh Tao. The boat ride offers a scenic tour along the Gulf of Thailand, and your private transfer will meet you at the harbor as it ends. The island life will embrace you immediately in the mixture of tropical jungle and pristine white sands, and you will settle into the perfect privacy of your resort-style accommodation that overlooks the south end of the island. Umbrellas shade the outdoor restaurant as palm trees reach their fronds over the edges of the immaculate pool. The window of your suite offers a fabulous view of the peaceful waters of the Gulf of Thailand, and the remainder of the day is yours to indulge in the eight square kilometers of paradise. The two of you will take to the beach in the afternoon to enjoy the sunset together as the violet, crimson, and sage hues layer the sky before the sun sinks behind the horizon.

dayInfo.title: Koh Tao – Enjoy a Half-Day Tour of the Island’s Views and Serene Beaches
dayInfo.description: In the morning, breakfast will be brought to you with a delicious array of exotic fruits included in the specialized menu. The aroma of fresh pineapple juice will accompany the vibrant colors of rambutan, and after the meal, you will set out on the windy roads of the island to enjoy the remarkable views. You will begin with an adventure to John-Suwan Viewpoint which offers a view of Chalok Baan Kao and Thian Og bays. You will make your way along the trail, passing beneath the coconut palms and lush jungle canopy as butterflies flutter their wings around the blossoming hyacinths. Upon reaching the panorama, the two of you will find a breathtaking view. You will share the outlook only with each other as you as you stand on the granite rock that sweeps across the emerald canopy, over the cobalt and sapphire waters. Return to the shoreline after you have uncovered the brilliant views across the island to relax at Aow Muang, a bay that features some of the best snorkeling spots on Koh Tao. Longboats wade in the water, anchored in the shallows as palm trees reach out over the shoreline and hover above the gentle water. You can dig your toes into the hot sand and embrace the sunlight or submerge your body into the refreshing water for pristine views to the sandy seafloor and turquoise hue. On the edge of the reef, you can spot the meandering barracuda.

dayInfo.title: Koh Tao – Bask in the Beauty of Koh Tao with a Day at Your Leisure
dayInfo.description: After indulging in a delicious breakfast in your private view, the two of you will have the remainder of the day to enjoy the wonders of Koh Tao at your leisure. Linger in the bamboo cafes along the beaches or bask in the refreshing pleasures of a couple’s spa treatment. You could board a long-tail boat to the Koh Nang Yuan, a collection of three islands that are connected by a thin sandbar and where the white grains of sand have a powdery, inviting texture. The water shimmers with sapphire and indigo colors as verdant bushes and trees spread across the granite rocks. A small beach resort edges the water, making it the perfect destination to grab your snorkel and dive right in. The cool water provides a refreshing reprieve from the jungle warmth as the coral along the reef will shimmer with pastels among the passing angelfish. Table coral and staghorn create a mosaic of textures representative of the unique ecosystem, and in the distance, a spotted eagle ray glides through the water with its wings glistening with the sunlight that pierces through the surface water. Their wingspan can reach a width of up to 10 feet, with their skin shimmering with white and blue spots.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Boat to Koh Samui and Delight in a Half-Day Discovery Tour
dayInfo.description: The morning breeze rustles through the palm trees around Koh Tao as turtles take to the waters around the coral reef in search of breakfast. You will find the aroma of hyacinth, mango, and guava fills the dining room as you take it all in and enjoy it. After your meal, you will have a private transfer to the harbor where you will board your private boat bound for Koh Samui. Sailing across the Gulf of Thailand offers pristine views of the sunlight as it glistens across the water and pink dolphins occasionally surface near the coast, poking their heads from the water in curious exploration. They can grow to 11.6 feet long and weigh more than 500 pounds as their tail splashes down on the water to show visible hues of gray and pink. Your boat will dock at Koh Samui’s harbor, and long-tail boats moor closer to the sand, with their skippers wading through water more than ankle deep to reach the shoreline. Your private transfer will welcome you to the island and escort you to your gorgeous resort set beside a white-sand beach. The pool offers views to the Gulf of Thailand and the serene ambiance filters into your private room for a perfect romantic getaway. Koh Samui is Thailand’s second largest island, with an area of 88 square miles. Your private guide will greet you and your partner in the lobby, eager to introduce you to the splendors of the island on your half-day tour. Large coconut plantations and lush forest grow along the interior with pristine beaches that sparkle along the shoreline. Elephants trek through the trees, and the lush canopy hides spectacular waterfalls. You will begin your tour with a visit to the famous Big Buddha as the statue glints with golden hues above the trees and reaches a height of nearly 40 feet. The figure creates an alluring silhouette in contrast to the clear blue skies of the tropical haven.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Travel the Island for Waterfalls and the Secret Buddha Garden
dayInfo.description: At breakfast, you can both linger in the dining room to enjoy the rustic painted wood and colorful décor that adds a romantic atmosphere to the morning light. Your guide will greet you both after your meal ready to lead you through the center of the island to discover the captivating countryside. Traverse the trail that meanders beneath the jungle canopy, and the adventure of it all will make your heart pulse with excitement. You will be able to hear the water splashing in the distance beyond the blossoming hyacinth and oleanders when all of the sudden the path will open to a view of the fabulous Na Muang falls as they cascade down the purple rocks at a height of nearly 100 feet. The river spreads over the rocks like a blanket before splashing into the waiting pool, and the water creates a thin layer of mist that fills the air around you. The droplets will land on your cheek and send a refreshing cool across your skin. The water will feel colder as you dip your fingers into the pool and notice the true temperature of the mountain spring as it meets the heat of the jungle. In the afternoon, you can continue to the serene surroundings of the Secret Buddha Garden that is set beneath the summit of Pom Mountain. A stream travels through the grounds to create a series of miniature waterfalls. The sound provides a tranquil soundtrack to your time spent strolling through the walkways as the statues decorate the entire garden representing figures of Buddhist mythology. Bamboo trees, coconut plantations, and durian farms encircle the garden’s borders, and each statue tells a story known to many locals as a work of mythology told through evocative art, bringing a perfect opportunity for a romantic stroll.

dayInfo.title: Koh Samui – Depart for Home
dayInfo.description: The Samui Butterfly Garden will glow with the vibrant colors of hundreds of butterflies as they flutter around visitors. The room takes on a kaleidoscope sort of view with radiant indigo and lime hues connected to the unique patterns of the butterfly wings. These flying works of art linger on sweet bananas and settle along the petals of bright-red hibiscus flowers as marigolds blossom with vibrant orange and yellow hues with a rounded, feathery texture. At breakfast, the two of you will linger in the view of the seaside as the subtle aroma of coconut drifts through the air as you enjoy one last leisurely morning. Your private transfer will greet you at your hotel ready to escort you to Samui Airport. Instead of heading home, you could also extend your honeymoon and take the time to visit Chiang Mai in northern Thailand or revel in the island life of Bali, Indonesia.

tourName: Luxury Tour for Lovers: 12 Days of Thailand’s Beauty
placesVisited: Chiang Mai, Lampang, Bangkok, Khao Yai, Phuket, Koh Yao Noi
generalInfo: Thailand’s culture runs deep in the Northern capital of Chiang Mai, and its tropical beauty is best explored on immaculate white-sand beaches. Secluded opulence can be found within the bustling city of Bangkok, and romantic coastal adventures wait for you on the shores of Phuket. Cherish an intimate, 5-star escape to Thailand on this carefully curated couple’s tour. You and your partner will delve into the astounding cultural traditions, capture surreal vistas across the diverse landscape, and reconnect in the isolated splendor of the country’s premier resorts. Thailand’s beloved destinations await you on this passionate, 12-day tour that will have you daydreaming about Thailand for years to come.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Retreat to the Cultural Heart of Thailand
dayInfo.description: For your first stop in Thailand, you will escape to the culturally rich and scenically beautiful destination of Chiang Mai, where you and your partner will comfortably transfer to a premier resort that is tucked beneath the Doi Suthep Mountain. Slowly unpack your things and begin to feel the calm atmosphere as it resonates from the unspoiled wildlife that flanks the resort. From the luxury of your secluded balcony, you will witness sweeping landscape vistas, and spend the afternoon at your leisure as you acclimatize to the area around you. Whether you wish to lounge by the pool or experience a traditional couple’s Thai massage, intimate relaxation awaits, and world-class amenities will keep you thoroughly enthused and entertained.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – The Northern Capital’s Flawless Charm
dayInfo.description: Chiang Mai is a cultural hub that is home to an array of significant landmarks. You will journey to these pivotal locations shortly after waking up today. The Huay Kaew Waterfall cascades over large rocks that have been stuck within the luscious forest. It is an endearing spot to enjoy a romantic picnic as you soak up the natural splendor. A refreshing dip in the cool waters will revitalize your bodies, and afterward, you can venture to a decadent restaurant that overlooks the rainforest. Flowered walls encompass the terrace, the warm sun illuminates the tropical alcove, and delicately prepared Thai cuisine will send mouthwatering wafts of spices and flavors into the air. You will delight in complete romance for brunch at this prestigious restaurant, and later today, you and your partner will climb to the crest of Doi Suthep Mountain via cable car. The famous Wat Phra That temple sits strikingly atop the mountain’s peak. Colorful murals, elaborate statues, and delicate carvings adorn the golden temple’s complex. The viewpoint shares uninterrupted vistas of the greater Chiang Mai area, and you can capture these immaculate sights before you return to the base of the mountain and indulge in an award-winning meal from a nearby restaurant.

dayInfo.title: Chiang Mai – Visit a Riverside Town with Old-World Appeal
dayInfo.description: The following day, you will retreat to the old-world town of Lampang. Here, ornate horse-drawn wagons trot past the beautiful architecture that lines the streets. The unique romantic charm of this less-traveled riverside town is rarely rivaled, and you can immerse yourselves in Thai history as you visit the beloved temples and coveted museums. You can even capture unforgettable images as you enjoy intimate strolls with idyllic river backdrops. Finally, you will encounter magnificent elephants at an ethical sanctuary that is dedicated to the rehabilitation of these impressive creatures. Accompanied by a knowledgeable guide, your day tour to Lampang will leave you at your luxurious accommodation, satisfied and excited for the days to come.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Remarkable Sunsets on a Regal River Cruise
dayInfo.description: You will travel to Bangkok on the fourth day of your trip for exclusive experiences in Thailand’s thriving capital. You will transfer to your luxury hotel that is located on the banks of the famous Chao Phraya River, which is an immaculate body of water that flows through the magnificent cityscape. Your lavish suite will share panoramic views of these scenes, and shortly afterward, you will glide across the water on a regal river cruise. You can lose yourselves in the sheer luxury of this experience as exceptional head chefs prepare remarkable Thai dishes for your candlelit dinner date, and stellar live performances will provide entertainment as you explore the wonderful flavors. The sky will turn shades of pink and orange as the day slowly gives way to the night, and you will conclude your gourmet dinner with a sumptuous dessert while the moon dances in the sky.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Bangkok’s Beloved Attractions
dayInfo.description: A trip to Bangkok will be incomplete without an in-depth exploration of its prominent and cultural landmarks. Sprawled across the bustling city are some of Thailand’s most revered temples or Wats. Your experienced tour guide for the day will collect you at your hotel and transfer you to these monumental and spiritual sites. As you wander through the sacred halls of Bangkok’s beloved temples, you will feel a sense of great admiration for the spiritual dedication of the people who call this country home. Wat Pho boasts a momentous golden, reclining Buddha while Wat Phra Kaew houses the world-famous Emerald Buddha. Each distinguished Wat has been meticulously crafted, and beyond the picture-perfect moments, they share great insight into ancient Buddhist spirituality. Later, you can visit an authentic Thai market for a vibrant tour of traditional cuisine and weave through the lively stalls, which are lined with local delicacies that you will rarely be able to find anywhere else. Following lunch, you will transfer to recognized museums and art galleries in the city, which is where you will uncover ancient artifacts and local talent as you visit premier cultural hotspots. Finally, conclude your evening with gourmet dinner atop one of Bangkok’s towering skyscrapers. With a 360-degree view of the entire city, you will delight in intimate dining like never before.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – A Taste for the Finer Things
dayInfo.description: You will begin your final day in Bangkok, developing your taste for Thailand.
